[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-     start_offset = offset;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-     tree = [0m[1;35mproto_item_add_subtree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mitem, ett_irc_request_command_part[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-     [0m[1;35mwhile[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_offset_exists[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-         length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-         end_offset = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m','[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m end_offset == [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             int start_message = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m':'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m start_message == [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-                 [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_part_channel, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtvb, start_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-                 [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-                 [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-                 [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m? length : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-                 [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-                 [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-                 return;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             length = start_message-start_offset;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_part_channel, tvb, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             start_message++;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_message[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_part_message, tvb, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_message, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             return;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-         [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-         [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-         [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-         [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-         [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_join_channel, tvb, [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-         start_offset = end_offset + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-     [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-     return;[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+static void[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_join[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, proto_item *item, int offset[0m[1;39m)[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    proto_tree *tree;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    int start_offset;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    int end_offset;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    int length;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    int copy_length;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    uint8_t *channel_name;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_get_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[32m'#'[0m[1;39m)[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    start_offset = offset;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    channel_name = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name == NULL [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    tree = [0m[1;35mproto_item_add_subtree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mitem, ett_irc_request_command_join[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Parse the channels to join*[0m[35m/[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;35mwhile[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_offset_exists[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Find the comma[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        end_offset = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m','[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m end_offset == [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_join_channel, tvb, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            return;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        copy_length = end_offset - start_offset;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcopy_length < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcopy_length : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_join_channel, tvb, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, copy_length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        start_offset = end_offset + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    return;[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+static void[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_part[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, proto_item *item, int offset[0m[1;39m)[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    proto_tree *tree;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    int start_offset;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    uint8_t *channel_name;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_get_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[32m'#'[0m[1;39m)[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    channel_name = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name == NULL [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    start_offset = offset;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    tree = [0m[1;35mproto_item_add_subtree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mitem, ett_irc_request_command_part[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;35mwhile[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_offset_exists[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        end_offset = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m','[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m end_offset == [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            int start_message = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m':'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m start_message == [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_part_channel, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtvb, start_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m? length : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            length = start_message-start_offset;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_part_channel, tvb, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            start_message++;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_message[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m0x4e[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x41[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x4d[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x45[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x53[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x20[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x23[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x6[0m [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36mx61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x61[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x2c[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x23[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x68[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m,[0m[1;36m0x65[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x6c[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x6c[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x6f[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0xa[0m[39m,[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNAMES [0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa,#hello\[0m[1;36m012[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/user/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mwireshark[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpjtrn_6xz[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandler_irc -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability has been detected in the Wireshark IRC [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprotocol dissector during fuzzing operations. The issue occurs when processing IRC [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNAMES commands with specially crafted input, resulting in a [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m-byte write [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moperation beyond the bounds of a [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte allocated buffer. The vulnerability is [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtriggered in the `dissect_irc_names` function and manifests as a multi-byte write [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow with a SCARINESS score of [0m[1;36m45[0m[39m.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Vulnerability Type[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis is a **heap-buffer-overflow** vulnerability, specifically a write operation [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat exceeds allocated heap memory bounds. AddressSanitizer has classified this as [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39ma [0m[32m"multi-byte-write-heap-buffer-overflow."[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Issue Details[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe overflow occurs during the processing of an IRC NAMES command. The stack trace [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreveals the following call sequence:[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. The fuzzer input is processed through `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` in the fuzzing [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mharness[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. The packet dissection flows through `dissect_frame` → `dissect_irc` → [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`dissect_irc_request` → `dissect_irc_request_command`[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. The vulnerability is triggered in `dissect_irc_names` at line [0m[1;36m563[0m[39m of [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`packet-irc.c`[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. The actual overflow occurs in `tvb_memcpy` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcalled from `dissect_irc_names`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhich attempts to copy [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes into a buffer that only has [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m bytes allocated[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Memory Allocation Details[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAccording to the AddressSanitizer report:[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte region was allocated at address range `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x5060001c64c0[0m[39m, [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m0x5060001c64f3[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The allocation occurred in `dissect_irc_names` at line [0m[1;36m537[0m[39m of `packet-irc.c`[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The write operation attempted to write [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes starting at address [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;36m0x5060001c64f3[0m[39m`, which is exactly at the end of the allocated region [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0[0m[39m bytes [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mafter the [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte region[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Triggering Input[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fuzzer-generated input that triggers this vulnerability is:[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNAMES [0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa,#hello\n[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis input consists of:[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The IRC command [0m[32m"NAMES"[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A channel name starting with [0m[32m'#'[0m[39m followed by [0m[1;36m125[0m[39m [0m[32m'a'[0m[39m characters[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A comma separator[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Another channel name [0m[32m"#hello"[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A newline character[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe pattern suggests that the vulnerability is related to handling long channel [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnames in IRC NAMES commands.[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Code Locations to Investigate[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo understand this issue holistically, the following code areas should be examined:[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Primary Location - `epan/dissectors/packet-irc.c`**:[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m537[0m[39m: Where the [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte buffer is allocated in `dissect_irc_names`[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m563[0m[39m: Where the overflow occurs via `tvb_memcpy` call[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The entire `dissect_irc_names` function to understand buffer size calculations[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Line [0m[1;36m702[0m[39m: `dissect_irc_request_command` where `dissect_irc_names` is called[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Related Functions**:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `dissect_irc_request` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m811[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: Parent function handling IRC request [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprocessing[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `dissect_irc` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m1114[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: Main IRC dissection entry point[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `tvb_memcpy` in `epan/tvbuff.c` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m945[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: The function performing the actual[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmemory copy[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Buffer Management**:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The logic determining the allocation size [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m51[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The logic determining the copy size [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Any size validation or bounds checking that should occur between allocation [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand copying[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Important Observations[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. The discrepancy between allocated size [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m51[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and attempted copy size [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m132[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m suggests either incorrect buffer size calculation during allocation or [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmissing bounds validation before the copy operation[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. The input contains a very long channel name [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m125[0m[39m characters of [0m[32m'a'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlikely exceeds expected limits[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. The overflow occurs at a precise boundary [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0[0m[39m bytes after the allocated region[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mindicating the write starts exactly where the allocated memory ends[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. The vulnerability is consistently reproducible with the provided input pattern[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mhandler_irc[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mTESTCASE[0m[39m=[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -f [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m572[0m[39m: [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m573[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m574[0m[39m: static void[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m575[0m[39m: [0m[1;35mdissect_irc_list[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, proto_item *item, int offset[0m[1;39m)[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m576[0m[39m: [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m577[0m[39m:     proto_tree *tree;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m578[0m[39m:     int start_offset;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m579[0m[39m:     int end_offset;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m580[0m[39m:     int length;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m581[0m[39m:     uint8_t *channel_name;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m582[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m583[0m[39m:     if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_get_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[32m'#'[0m[1;39m)[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m584[0m[39m:         return;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m585[0m[39m:     [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m586[0m[39m:     channel_name = [0m[1;35mmalloc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m587[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m588[0m[39m:     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name == NULL [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m589[0m[39m:         return;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m590[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m591[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m592[0m[39m:     start_offset = offset;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m593[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m594[0m[39m:     tree = [0m[1;35mproto_item_add_subtree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mitem, ett_irc_request_command_list[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m595[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m596[0m[39m:     [0m[1;35mwhile[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_offset_exists[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m597[0m[39m:         length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m598[0m[39m:         end_offset = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m','[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m599[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m600[0m[39m:         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m end_offset == [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m601[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_list_channel, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtvb, start_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m602[0m[39m:             [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m603[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m604[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m? length : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m605[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m606[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m607[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m608[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m609[0m[39m:             return;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m610[0m[39m:         [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m611[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m612[0m[39m:         [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m613[0m[39m:         [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend_offset-start_offset <[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? end_offset-start_offset : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m614[0m[39m:         [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m615[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m616[0m[39m:         [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_list_channel, tvb, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, end_offset-start_offset, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m617[0m[39m:         start_offset = end_offset + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m618[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m619[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m620[0m[39m:     [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m621[0m[39m:     return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m622[0m[39m: [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m623[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m624[0m[39m: static void[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m625[0m[39m: [0m[1;35mdissect_irc_whois[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, proto_item *item, int offset[0m[1;39m)[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m626[0m[39m: [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m633[0m[39m:     start_offset = offset;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m634[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m635[0m[39m:     [0m[1;35mwhile[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_offset_exists[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m636[0m[39m:         length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m637[0m[39m:         end_offset = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m','[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, end_offset-start_offset, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m466[0m[39m:     start_message++;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m467[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m468[0m[39m:     length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_message[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m469[0m[39m:     [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_privmsg_message, tvb, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_message, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m470[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m471[0m[39m:     return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mepan/dissectors/packet-irc.[0m[1;92mc:1[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m50[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* packet-irc.c[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m: * Wireshark - Network traffic analyzer[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m: * By Gerald Combs <gerald@wireshark.org>[0m                                         [2m                [0m
