[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m8[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m9[0m[39m: * SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-[0m[1;36m2.0[0m[39m-or-later[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m10[0m[39m: *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m11[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m12[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m13[0m[39m: * Routines for IRC packet dissection[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m14[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m15[0m[39m: * See[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m16[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m17[0m[39m: *  [0m[4;94mhttp://www.irchelp.org/irchelp/rfc/[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m18[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m19[0m[39m: * and the RFCs and other documents it mentions, such as RFC [0m[1;36m1459[0m[39m, RFCs[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m20[0m[39m: * [0m[1;36m2810[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m2811[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m2812[0m[39m, and [0m[1;36m2813[0m[39m,[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m21[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m22[0m[39m: * For CTCP, see :[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m23[0m[39m: *  [0m[4;94mhttp://www.irchelp.org/irchelp/rfc/ctcpspec.html[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m24[0m[39m: *  [0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [4;94mhttp://web.archive.org/web/20031203073050/http://www.invlogic.com/irc/ctcp.html[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m25[0m[39m: *  [0m[4;94mhttps://www.ietf.org/archive/id/draft-oakley-irc-ctcp-02.txt[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m26[0m[39m: *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m27[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m28[0m[39m: #include [0m[32m"config.h"[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m29[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m30[0m[39m: #include <epan/packet.h>[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m31[0m[39m: #include <epan/expert.h>[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m32[0m[39m: #include <wsutil/array.h>[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m33[0m[39m: [0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m34[0m[39m: void [0m[1;35mproto_register_irc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m35[0m[39m: void [0m[1;35mproto_reg_handoff_irc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m36[0m[39m: [0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m37[0m[39m: static int proto_irc;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m38[0m[39m: static int proto_irc_ctcp;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m39[0m[39m: static int hf_irc_request;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m40[0m[39m: static int hf_irc_request_prefix;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m41[0m[39m: static int hf_irc_request_command;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m42[0m[39m: static int hf_irc_request_command_pass;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m43[0m[39m: static int hf_irc_request_command_pass_password;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m44[0m[39m: static int hf_irc_request_command_nick;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m45[0m[39m: static int hf_irc_request_command_nick_nick;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m46[0m[39m: static int hf_irc_request_command_user;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m47[0m[39m: static int hf_irc_request_command_user_user;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m48[0m[39m: static int hf_irc_request_command_user_host;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m49[0m[39m: static int hf_irc_request_command_user_server;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m50[0m[39m: static int hf_irc_request_command_user_real;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mepan/tvbuff.h:[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m200[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m** @file[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m: * Testy, [0m[1;35mVirtual[0m[1;39m([0m[39m-izable[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Buffer of uint8_t*'s[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m: * [0m[32m"Testy"[0m[39m -- the buffer gets mad when an attempt is made to access data[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m: *      beyond the bounds of the buffer. An exception is thrown.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m8[0m[39m: * [0m[32m"Virtual"[0m[39m -- the buffer can have its own data, can use a subset of[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m9[0m[39m: *      the data of a backing tvbuff, or can be a composite of[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m10[0m[39m: *      other tvbuffs.[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m11[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m12[0m[39m: * Copyright [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;36m2000[0m[39m by Gilbert Ramirez <gram@alumni.rice.edu>[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m13[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m14[0m[39m: * Wireshark - Network traffic analyzer[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m15[0m[39m: * By Gerald Combs <gerald@wireshark.org>[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m16[0m[39m: * Copyright [0m[1;36m1998[0m[39m Gerald Combs[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m17[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m18[0m[39m: * SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-[0m[1;36m2.0[0m[39m-or-later[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m19[0m[39m: *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m20[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m21[0m[39m:#ifndef __TVBUFF_H__[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m22[0m[39m:#define __TVBUFF_H__[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m23[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m24[0m[39m:#include <ws_symbol_export.h>[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m25[0m[39m:#include <ws_attributes.h>[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m26[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m27[0m[39m:#include <epan/guid-utils.h>[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m28[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m29[0m[39m:#include <wsutil/inet_addr.h>[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m30[0m[39m:#include <wsutil/nstime.h>[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m31[0m[39m:#include [0m[32m"wsutil/ws_mempbrk.h"[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m32[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m33[0m[39m:#ifdef __cplusplus[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m34:e[0m[39mxtern [0m[32m"C"[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m35[0m[39m:#endif [0m[35m/[0m[39m* __cplusplus *[0m[35m/[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m36[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m37[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m**[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m38[0m[39m: * [0m[32m"testy, virtual[0m[32m([0m[32m-izable[0m[32m)[0m[32m buffer"[0m[39m.  They are testy in that they get mad when[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m39[0m[39m: * an attempt is made to access data beyond the bounds of their array. In that[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m40[0m[39m: * case, they throw an exception.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m41[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m42[0m[39m: * They are virtualizable in that new tvbuff's can be made from other tvbuffs,[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m43[0m[39m: * while only the original tvbuff may have data. That is, the new tvbuff has[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m44[0m[39m: * virtual data.[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m45[0m[39m: *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m46[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m47[0m[39m:struct tvbuff;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m48[0m[39m:typedef struct tvbuff tvbuff_t;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m49[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m50[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m** @defgroup tvbuff Testy, [0m[1;35mVirtual[0m[1;39m([0m[39m-izable[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Buffers[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m51[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m52[0m[39m: * Dissector use and management[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m53[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m54[0m[39m: *  Consider a collection of tvbs as being a chain or stack of tvbs.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m: *  When dissecting a frame:[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m: *   The top-level dissector [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpacket.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pushes the initial tvb [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcontaining[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m: *   the complete frame[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m onto the stack [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstarts the chain[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and then calls[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m: *   a sub-dissector which in turn calls the next sub-dissector and so on.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m: *   Each sub-dissector may chain additional tvbs [0m[1;39m([0m[39msee below[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to the tvb[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m: *   handed to that dissector. After dissection is complete and control has[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m: *   returned to the top-level dissector, the chain of tvbs [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstack[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is free'd[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m: *   via a call to [0m[1;35mtvb_free_chain[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39min [0m[1;35mepan_dissect_cleanup[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m64[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m65[0m[39m: * A dissector:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m66[0m[39m: *  - Can chain new tvbs [0m[1;39m([0m[39msubset, real, composite[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to the[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m67[0m[39m: *    tvb handed to the dissector using [0m[1;35mtvb_new_subset_length_caplen[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m68[0m[39m: *    [0m[1;35mtvb_new_subset_length[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mtvb_new_subset_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m69[0m[39m: *    [0m[1;35mtvb_new_child_real_data[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;35mtvb_set_child_real_data_tvbuff[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m70[0m[39m: *    [0m[1;35mtvb_composite_finalize[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, and [0m[1;35mtvb_child_uncompress[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. [0m[1;39m([0m[39mComposite[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m71[0m[39m: *    tvbs should reference only tvbs which are already part of the chain[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m72[0m[39m: *  - Must not save for later use [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., when dissecting another frame[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m a[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m73[0m[39m: *    pointer to a tvb handed to the dissector; [0m[1;39m([0m[39mA higher level function[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m74[0m[39m: *    may very well free the chain thus leaving a dangling pointer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m75[0m[39m: *    This [0m[1;39m([0m[39mobviously[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m also applies to any tvbs chained to the tvb handed[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m76[0m[39m: *    to the dissector.[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m77[0m[39m: *  - Can create its own tvb chain [0m[1;39m([0m[39musing [0m[1;35mtvb_new_real_data[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m which the[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m78[0m[39m: *    dissector is free to manage as desired.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m79[0m[39m: * @[0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m80[0m[39m: *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m81[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m82[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m** A [0m[32m"real"[0m[39m tvbuff contains a uint8_t* that points to real data.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m83[0m[39m: * The data is allocated and contiguous.[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m84[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m85[0m[39m: * A [0m[32m"subset"[0m[39m tvbuff has a backing tvbuff. It is a [0m[32m"window"[0m[39m through[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m86[0m[39m: * which the program sees only a portion of the backing tvbuff.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m87[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m88[0m[39m: * A [0m[32m"composite"[0m[39m tvbuff combines multiple tvbuffs sequentially to[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m89[0m[39m: * produce a larger byte array.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m90[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m91[0m[39m: * tvbuff's of any type can be used as the backing-tvbuff of a[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m92[0m[39m: * [0m[32m"subset"[0m[39m tvbuff or as a member of a [0m[32m"composite"[0m[39m tvbuff.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m93[0m[39m: * [0m[32m"composite"[0m[39m tvbuffs can have member-tvbuffs of different types.[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m94[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m95[0m[39m: * Once a tvbuff is create/initialized/finalized, the tvbuff is read-only.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m96[0m[39m: * That is, it cannot point to any other data. A new tvbuff must be created if[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m97[0m[39m: * you want a tvbuff that points to other data.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m98[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m99[0m[39m: * tvbuff's are normally chained together to allow efficient de-allocation of[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m100[0m[39m: * tvbuff's.[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m101[0m[39m: *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m102[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m103[0m[39m:typedef void [0m[1;39m([0m[39m*tvbuff_free_cb_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m104[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m105[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m** Extracts [0m[32m'number of bits'[0m[39m starting at [0m[32m'bit offset'[0m[39m.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m106[0m[39m: * Returns a pointer to a newly initialized g_malloc'd REAL_DATA[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m107[0m[39m: * tvbuff with the bits octet aligned.[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m108[0m[39m: * Bits are counted from MSB [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to LSB [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m7[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m within octets.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m109[0m[39m: *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m110[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC tvbuff_t *[0m[1;35mtvb_new_octet_aligned[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb,[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m111[0m[39m:    uint32_t bit_offset, int32_t no_of_bits[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m112[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m113[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m** Extracts [0m[32m'number of bits'[0m[39m starting at [0m[32m'bit offset'[0m[39m.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m114[0m[39m: * Bits are counted from LSB [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to MSB [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m7[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m within octets.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m115[0m[39m: *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m116[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC tvbuff_t *[0m[1;35mtvb_new_octet_right_aligned[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb,[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m117[0m[39m:    uint32_t bit_offset, int32_t no_of_bits[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m118[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m119[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC tvbuff_t *[0m[1;35mtvb_new_chain[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *parent, tvbuff_t *backing[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m120[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m121[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC tvbuff_t *[0m[1;35mtvb_clone[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m122[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m123[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC tvbuff_t *[0m[1;35mtvb_clone_offset_len[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, unsigned offset,[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m124[0m[39m:    unsigned len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m125[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m126[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m** Free a tvbuff_t and all tvbuffs chained from it[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m127[0m[39m: * The tvbuff must be [0m[32m'the '[0m[39mhead' [0m[1;39m([0m[39minitial[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m tvb of a chain or[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m128[0m[39m: * must not be in a chain.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m129[0m[39m: * If specified, a callback to free the tvbuff data will be invoked[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m130[0m[39m: * for each tvbuff free'd *[0m[35m/[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m131[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC void [0m[1;35mtvb_free[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m132[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m133[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m** Free the tvbuff_t and all tvbuffs chained from it.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m134[0m[39m: * The tvbuff must be [0m[32m'the '[0m[39mhead' [0m[1;39m([0m[39minitial[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m tvb of a chain or[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m135[0m[39m: * must not be in a chain.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m136[0m[39m: * If specified, a callback to free the tvbuff data will be invoked[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m137[0m[39m: * for each tvbuff free'd *[0m[35m/[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m138[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC void [0m[1;35mtvb_free_chain[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m139[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m140[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m** Set a callback function to call when a tvbuff is actually freed[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m141[0m[39m: * One argument is passed to that callback --- a void* that points[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m142[0m[39m: * to the real data. Obviously, this only applies to a[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m143[0m[39m: * [0m[32m"real"[0m[39m tvbuff. *[0m[35m/[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m144[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC void [0m[1;35mtvb_set_free_cb[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, const tvbuff_free_cb_t func[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m145[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m146[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m** Attach a [0m[32m"real"[0m[39m tvbuff to a parent tvbuff. This connection is used[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m147[0m[39m: * during a [0m[1;35mtvb_free_chain[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[33m...[0m[39m the [0m[32m"child"[0m[39m [0m[32m"real"[0m[39m tvbuff acts as if it[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m148[0m[39m: * is part of the chain-of-creation of the parent tvbuff, although it[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m149[0m[39m: * isn't. This is useful if you need to take the data from some tvbuff,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m150[0m[39m: * run some operation on it, like decryption or decompression, and make[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m151[0m[39m: * a new tvbuff from it, yet want the new tvbuff to be part of the chain.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m152[0m[39m: * The reality is that the new tvbuff *is* part of the [0m[32m"chain of creation"[0m[39m,[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m153[0m[39m: * but in a way that these tvbuff routines are ignorant of. Use this[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m154[0m[39m: * function to make the tvbuff routines knowledgable of this fact. *[0m[35m/[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m155[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC void [0m[1;35mtvb_set_child_real_data_tvbuff[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *parent,[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m156[0m[39m:    tvbuff_t *child[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m157[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m158[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC tvbuff_t *[0m[1;35mtvb_new_child_real_data[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *parent,[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m159[0m[39m:    const uint8_t *data, const unsigned length, const int reported_length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m160[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m161[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m** Create a tvbuff backed by existing data. Can throw ReportedBoundsError.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m162[0m[39m: * Normally, a callback to free the data should be registered using[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m163[0m[39m: * [0m[1;35mtvb_set_free_cb[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; when this tvbuff is freed, then your callback will be[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m164[0m[39m: * called, and at that time you can free your original data. *[0m[35m/[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m165[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC tvbuff_t *[0m[1;35mtvb_new_real_data[0m[1;39m([0m[39mconst uint8_t *data,[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m166[0m[39m:    const unsigned length, const int reported_length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m167[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m168[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m** Create a tvbuff that's a subset of another tvbuff, with the captured[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m169[0m[39m: * length explicitly given. You probably want [0m[1;35mtvb_new_subset_length[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m170[0m[39m: * [0m[1;35mtvb_new_subset_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m instead.[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m171[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m172[0m[39m: * @param backing The backing tvbuff onto which the new tvbuff is a view[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m173[0m[39m: * @param backing_offset If positive, is the offset from the beginning of[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m174[0m[39m: * the backing tvbuff at which the new tvbuff's data begins, and, if[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m175[0m[39m: * negative, is the offset from the end of the backing tvbuff at which[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m176[0m[39m: * the new tvbuff's data begins.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m177[0m[39m: * @param backing_length The length of the data to include in the new[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m178[0m[39m: * tvbuff, starting with the byte at [0m[32m'backing_offset'[0m[39m; if [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m, it[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m179[0m[39m: * means [0m[32m"to the end of the backing tvbuff"[0m[39m.  It can be [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, although[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m180[0m[39m: * the usefulness of the buffer would be rather limited.  The length[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m181[0m[39m: * actually included will be no more than the reported length.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m182[0m[39m: * @param reported_length The reported length of the new tvbuff; if [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m, it[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m183[0m[39m: * means [0m[32m"the reported length to the end of the backing tvbuff"[0m[39m.  It can[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m184[0m[39m: * be [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, although the usefulness of the buffer would be rather limited.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m185[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m186[0m[39m: * @return A tvbuff that is a subset of the backing tvbuff beginning at[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m187[0m[39m: * backing_offset [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich is offset [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m in the subset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and with the given[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m188[0m[39m: * reported_length, with captured length no more than backing_length.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m189[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m190[0m[39m: * @note In most cases use [0m[1;35mtvb_new_subset_length[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor equivalently, pass [0m[1;36m-1[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m191[0m[39m: * as [0m[32m'backing_length'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or [0m[1;35mtvb_new_subset_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m instead.  Use this when[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m192[0m[39m: * the backing tvbuff includes bytes at the end that must not be included in[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m193[0m[39m: * the subset regardless of the reported length, such as an FCS or padding.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m194[0m[39m: * In such cases it may still be simpler to call [0m[1;35mtvb_new_subset_length[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m195[0m[39m: * twice, once to remove the trailing bytes and once to select the chosen[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m196[0m[39m: * payload bytes.[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m197[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m198[0m[39m: * @warning Will throw BoundsError if [0m[32m'backing_offset'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'length'[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m199[0m[39m: * is beyond the bounds of the backing tvbuff.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m200[0m[39m: * Can throw ReportedBoundsError. *[0m[35m/[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mepan/dissectors/packet-irc.[0m[1;92mc:620[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m750[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m620[0m[39m:     [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m621[0m[39m:     return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m622[0m[39m: [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m625[0m[39m: [0m[1;35mdissect_irc_whois[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, proto_item *item, int offset[0m[1;39m)[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m626[0m[39m: [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m868[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mcommand_tree, hf_irc_request_command_param, [0m   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m870[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m871[0m[39m:             [0m[35m/[0m[39m* clear out any whitespace before next command parameter *[0m[35m/[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m872[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mwhile[0m[1;39m([0m[39moffset < end_offset && [0m[1;35mtvb_get_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m == [0m[32m' '[0m[1;39m)[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m873[0m[39m:             [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m874[0m[39m:                 offset++;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m875[0m[39m:             [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m876[0m[39m:             if [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffset == end_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m877[0m[39m:             [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m878[0m[39m:                 break;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m595[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m596[0m[39m:     [0m[1;35mwhile[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_offset_exists[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m597[0m[39m:         length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m598[0m[39m:         end_offset = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m','[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m599[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m600[0m[39m:         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m end_offset == [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m601[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_list_channel, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtvb, start_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m602[0m[39m:             [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m603[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m604[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m? length : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m605[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m606[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m607[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m608[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m609[0m[39m:             return;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m610[0m[39m:         [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m611[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m612[0m[39m:         [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m613[0m[39m:         [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend_offset-start_offset <[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? end_offset-start_offset : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m614[0m[39m:         [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m615[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m616[0m[39m:         [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_list_channel, tvb, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, end_offset-start_offset, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m617[0m[39m:         start_offset = end_offset + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m618[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m619[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m620[0m[39m:     [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mepan/dissectors/packet-irc.[0m[1;92mc:200[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m300[0m                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* tvbuff.c[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m: * Testy, [0m[1;35mVirtual[0m[1;39m([0m[39m-izable[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Buffer of uint8_t*'s[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m: * [0m[32m"Testy"[0m[39m -- the buffer gets mad when an attempt to access data[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m: *    [0m[39m        [0m[39mbeyond the bounds of the buffer. An exception is thrown.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m8[0m[39m: * [0m[32m"Virtual"[0m[39m -- the buffer can have its own data, can use a subset of[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m9[0m[39m: *    [0m[39m        [0m[39mthe data of a backing tvbuff, or can be a composite of[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m10[0m[39m: *   [0m[39m        [0m[39mother tvbuffs.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m11[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m12[0m[39m: * Copyright [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;36m2000[0m[39m by Gilbert Ramirez <gram@alumni.rice.edu>[0m                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2851[0m[39m: *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2852[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2853[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2854[0m[39m: * Given a wmem scope, a tvbuff, an offset, and a length, treat the string[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2855[0m[39m: * of bytes referred to by the tvbuff, offset, and length as an ASCII string,[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2856[0m[39m: * with all bytes with the high-order bit set being invalid, and return a[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2857[0m[39m: * pointer to a UTF-[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m string, allocated using the wmem scope.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2858[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2859[0m[39m: * Octets with the highest bit set will be converted to the Unicode[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2860[0m[39m: * REPLACEMENT CHARACTER.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2861[0m[39m: *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2862[0m[39m:static uint8_t *[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2863[0m[39m:[0m[1;35mtvb_get_ascii_string[0m[1;39m([0m[39mwmem_allocator_t *scope, tvbuff_t *tvb, int offset, int [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2864[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2865[0m[39m:   [0m[39mconst uint8_t *ptr;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2866[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2867[0m[39m:   [0m[39mptr = [0m[1;35mensure_contiguous[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset, length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2868[0m[39m:   [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;35mget_ascii_string[0m[1;39m([0m[39mscope, ptr, length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2869[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2870[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2871[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2872[0m[39m: * Given a wmem scope, a tvbuff, an offset, a length, and a translation table,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2873[0m[39m: * treat the string of bytes referred to by the tvbuff, offset, and length[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2874[0m[39m: * as a string encoded using one octet per character, with octets with the[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2875[0m[39m: * high-order bit clear being mapped by the translation table to [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m-byte[0m        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2878[0m[39m: * REPLACEMENT CHARACTER, and return a pointer to a UTF-[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m string,[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2879[0m[39m: * allocated using the wmem scope.[0m                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2900[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mepan/tvbuff.[0m[1;92mc:3000[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m3100[0m                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3018[0m[39m: * XXX - should map code points > 10FFFF to REPLACEMENT CHARACTERs.[0m            [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3075[0m[39m:   [0m[39mconst uint8_t *ptr;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3077[0m[39m:   [0m[1;35mDISSECTOR_ASSERT[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb && tvb->initialized[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3078[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3079[0m[39m:   [0m[39mptr = [0m[1;35mensure_contiguous[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset, length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3080[0m[39m:   [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;35mget_ts_23_038_7bits_string_unpacked[0m[1;39m([0m[39mscope, ptr, length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3081[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3082[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m3083:c[0m[39mhar *[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3084[0m[39m:[0m[1;35mtvb_get_etsi_ts_102_221_annex_a_string[0m[1;39m([0m[39mwmem_allocator_t *scope, tvbuff_t *tvb,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3085[0m[39m:   [0m[39mconst int offset, int length[0m[1;39m)[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3086[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3087[0m[39m:   [0m[39mconst uint8_t *ptr;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3088[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3089[0m[39m:   [0m[1;35mDISSECTOR_ASSERT[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb && tvb->initialized[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3090[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3091[0m[39m:   [0m[39mptr = [0m[1;35mensure_contiguous[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset, length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3092[0m[39m:   [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;35mget_etsi_ts_102_221_annex_a_string[0m[1;39m([0m[39mscope, ptr, length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3093[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3094[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m3095:c[0m[39mhar *[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3096[0m[39m:[0m[1;35mtvb_get_ascii_7bits_string[0m[1;39m([0m[39mwmem_allocator_t *scope, tvbuff_t *tvb,[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3097[0m[39m:   [0m[39mconst int bit_offset, int no_of_chars[0m[1;39m)[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3098[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3099[0m[39m:   [0m[39mint            in_offset = bit_offset >> [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m; [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Current pointer to the input[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3100[0m[39m:   [0m[39mint            length = [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mno_of_chars + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m7[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbit_offset & [0m[1;36m0x07[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m >> [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mepan/tvbuff.h:[0m[1;36m500[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m700[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m500[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* Fetch a GUID. *[0m[35m/[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m501[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC void [0m[1;35mtvb_get_ntohguid[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, const int offset,[0m            [2m                [0m
