[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m508[0m[39m:    e_guid_t *guid, const unsigned encoding[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m509[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m510[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* Fetches a byte array given a bit offset in a tvb *[0m[35m/[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m511[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC uint8_t* [0m[1;35mtvb_get_bits_array[0m[1;39m([0m[39mwmem_allocator_t *scope, tvbuff_t [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m*tvb,[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m512[0m[39m:    const int offset, size_t length, size_t *data_length, const unsigned [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mencoding[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m513[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m514[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* Fetch a specified number of bits from bit offset in a tvb.  All of these[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m515[0m[39m: * functions are equivalent, except for the type of the return value.  Note[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m516[0m[39m: * that the parameter encoding [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhere supplied[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m indicates the *bit* ordering[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m517[0m[39m: * within each octet, but offsets [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m7[0m[39m still indicate octet [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m in the buffer.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m518[0m[39m: * Versions of Wireshark prior to [0m[1;36m3.6[0m[39m ignored the encoding parameter.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m519[0m[39m: *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m520[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m521[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* get [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bits returned in a uint8_t *[0m[35m/[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m522[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC uint8_t [0m[1;35mtvb_get_bits8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, unsigned bit_offset,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m523[0m[39m:    const int no_of_bits[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m524[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m525[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* get [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m bits returned in a uint16_t *[0m[35m/[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m526[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC uint16_t [0m[1;35mtvb_get_bits16[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, unsigned bit_offset,[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m527[0m[39m:    const int no_of_bits, const unsigned encoding[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m528[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m529[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* get [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bits returned in a uint32_t *[0m[35m/[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m530[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC uint32_t [0m[1;35mtvb_get_bits32[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, unsigned bit_offset,[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m531[0m[39m:    const int no_of_bits, const unsigned encoding[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m532[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m533[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* get [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m64[0m[39m bits returned in a uint64_t *[0m[35m/[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m534[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC uint64_t [0m[1;35mtvb_get_bits64[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, unsigned bit_offset,[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m535[0m[39m:    const int no_of_bits, const unsigned encoding[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m536[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m537[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m**[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m538[0m[39m: *  This function has EXACTLY the same behavior as [0m[1;35mtvb_get_bits32[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m539[0m[39m: *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m540[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m541[0m[39m:[0m[1;35mWS_DEPRECATED_X[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Use tvb_get_bits32[0m[32m([0m[32m)[0m[32m instead"[0m[1;39m)[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m542[0m[39m:uint32_t [0m[1;35mtvb_get_bits[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, const unsigned bit_offset,[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m543[0m[39m:    const int no_of_bits, const unsigned encoding[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m544[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m545[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m** Returns target for convenience. Does not suffer from possible[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m546[0m[39m: * expense of [0m[1;35mtvb_get_ptr[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, since this routine is smart enough[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m547[0m[39m: * to copy data in chunks if the request range actually exists in[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m548[0m[39m: * different [0m[32m"real"[0m[39m tvbuffs. This function assumes that the target[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m549[0m[39m: * memory is already allocated; it does not allocate or free the[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m550[0m[39m: * target memory. *[0m[35m/[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m551[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC void *[0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, void *target, const int offset,[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m552[0m[39m:    size_t length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m553[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m554[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m** Given an allocator scope, a tvbuff, a byte offset, a byte length:[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m555[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m556[0m[39m: *    allocate a buffer using the specified scope;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m557[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m558[0m[39m: *    copy the data from the tvbuff specified by the offset and length[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m559[0m[39m: *    into that buffer, using [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m560[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m561[0m[39m: *    and return a pointer to the buffer.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m562[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m563[0m[39m: * Throws an exception if the tvbuff ends before the data being copied does.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m564[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m565[0m[39m: * If scope is set to NULL it is the user's responsibility to [0m[1;35mwmem_free[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m566[0m[39m: * the memory allocated. Otherwise memory is automatically freed when the[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m567[0m[39m: * scope lifetime is reached.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m568[0m[39m: *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m569[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC void *[0m[1;35mtvb_memdup[0m[1;39m([0m[39mwmem_allocator_t *scope, tvbuff_t *tvb,[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m570[0m[39m:    const int offset, size_t length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m571[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m572[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m** WARNING! This function is possibly expensive, temporarily allocating[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m573[0m[39m: * another copy of the packet data. Furthermore, it's dangerous because once[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m574[0m[39m: * this pointer is given to the user, there's no guarantee that the user will[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m575[0m[39m: * honor the [0m[32m'length'[0m[39m and not overstep the boundaries of the buffer.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m576[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m577[0m[39m: * If you're thinking of using tvb_get_ptr, STOP WHAT YOU ARE DOING[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m578[0m[39m: * IMMEDIATELY. Go take a break. Consider that tvb_get_ptr hands you[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m579[0m[39m: * a raw, unprotected pointer that you can easily use to create a[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m580[0m[39m: * security vulnerability or otherwise crash Wireshark. Then consider[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m581[0m[39m: * that you can probably find a function elsewhere in this file that[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m582[0m[39m: * does exactly what you want in a much more safe and robust manner.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m583[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m584[0m[39m: * The returned pointer is data that is internal to the tvbuff, so do not[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m585[0m[39m: * attempt to free it. Don't modify the data, either, because another tvbuff[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m586[0m[39m: * that might be using this tvbuff may have already copied that portion of[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m587[0m[39m: * the data [0m[1;39m([0m[39msometimes tvbuff's need to make copies of data, but that's the[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m588[0m[39m: * internal implementation that you need not worry about[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. Assume that the[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m589[0m[39m: * uint8_t* points to read-only data that the tvbuff manages.[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m590[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m591[0m[39m: * Return a pointer into our buffer if the data asked for via [0m[32m'offset'[0m[35m/[0m[32m'length'[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m592[0m[39m: * is contiguous [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich might not be the case for a [0m[32m"composite"[0m[39m tvbuff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. If the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m593[0m[39m: * data is not contiguous, a [0m[1;35mtvb_memdup[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is called for the entire buffer[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m594[0m[39m: * and the pointer to the newly-contiguous data is returned. This dynamically-[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m595[0m[39m: * allocated memory will be freed when the tvbuff is freed, after the[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m596[0m[39m: * [0m[1;35mtvbuff_free_cb_t[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is called, if any. *[0m[35m/[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m597[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC const uint8_t *[0m[1;35mtvb_get_ptr[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, const int offset,[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m598[0m[39m:    const int length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m599[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m600[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m** Find first occurrence of needle in tvbuff, starting at offset. Searches[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m601[0m[39m: * at most maxlength number of bytes; if maxlength is [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m, searches to[0m           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m690[0m[39m: * Given an allocator scope, a tvbuff, a byte offset, a byte length, and[0m        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m693[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m698[0m[39m: *    REPLACEMENT CHARACTER, and put the resulting UTF-[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m string, plus a[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m699[0m[39m: *    trailing [0m[32m'\0'[0m[39m, into that buffer;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m700[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mepan/tvbuff.h:[0m[1;36m700[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m900[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m700[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m703[0m[39m: * Throws an exception if the tvbuff ends before the string does.[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m704[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m705[0m[39m: * If scope is set to NULL it is the user's responsibility to [0m[1;35mwmem_free[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m707[0m[39m: * scope lifetime is reached.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m859[0m[39m: * Given a tvbuff and an offset, with the offset assumed to refer to[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m860[0m[39m: * a null-terminated string, find the length of that string [0m[1;39m([0m[39mand throw[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m861[0m[39m: * an exception if the tvbuff ends before we find the null[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, allocate[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m862[0m[39m: * a buffer big enough to hold the string, copy the string into it,[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m863[0m[39m: * and return a pointer to the string.  Also return the length of the[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m864[0m[39m: * string [0m[1;39m([0m[39mincluding the terminating null[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m through a pointer.[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m865[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m866[0m[39m: * This returns a constant [0m[1;39m([0m[39munmodifiable[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m string that does not need[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m867[0m[39m: * to be freed; instead, it will automatically be freed once the next[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m868[0m[39m: * packet is dissected.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m869[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m870[0m[39m: * It is slightly more efficient than the other routines, but does *NOT*[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m871[0m[39m: * do any translation to UTF-[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m - the string consists of the raw octets[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m872[0m[39m: * of the string, in whatever encoding they happen to be in, and, if[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m873[0m[39m: * the string is not valid in that encoding, with invalid octet sequences[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m874[0m[39m: * as they are in the packet.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m875[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m876[0m[39m: * This function is deprecated because it does no validation of the string[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m877[0m[39m: * encoding. Do not use in new code. Prefer other APIs such as:[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m878[0m[39m: *  [0m[1;35mtvb_get_stringz_enc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m879[0m[39m: *  [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item_ret_string_and_length[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m880[0m[39m: *  [0m[1;35mtvb_strsize[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and validate the pointed to memory region manually.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m881[0m[39m: *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m882[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m883[0m[39m:[0m[1;35mWS_DEPRECATED_X[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"Use APIs that return a valid UTF-8 string instead"[0m[1;39m)[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m884:c[0m[39monst uint8_t *[0m[1;35mtvb_get_const_stringz[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb,[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m885[0m[39m:    const int offset, int *lengthp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m886[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m887[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m** Looks for a NUL byte in tvbuff and copies[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m888[0m[39m: * no more than bufsize number of bytes, including terminating NUL, to buffer.[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m889[0m[39m: * Returns number of bytes copied [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnot including terminating NUL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m890[0m[39m: *[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m891[0m[39m: * When processing a packet where the remaining number of bytes is less[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m892[0m[39m: * than bufsize, an exception is not thrown if the end of the packet[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m893[0m[39m: * is reached before the NUL is found. The byte buffer is guaranteed to[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m894[0m[39m: * have a terminating NUL.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m895[0m[39m: *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m896[0m[39m:WS_DLL_PUBLIC int [0m[1;35mtvb_get_raw_bytes_as_stringz[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, const int offset,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m897[0m[39m:    const unsigned bufsize, uint8_t *buffer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m898[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m899[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m900[0m[39m: * Given a tvbuff, an offset into the tvbuff, a buffer, and a buffer size,[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m601[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_list_channel, [0m    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m602[0m[39m:             [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m603[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m604[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m? length : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m605[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m606[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m607[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m608[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m609[0m[39m:             return;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m610[0m[39m:         [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m611[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m612[0m[39m:         [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m613[0m[39m:         [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend_offset-start_offset <[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? end_offset-start_offset : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m614[0m[39m:         [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m615[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m616[0m[39m:         [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_list_channel, tvb, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, end_offset-start_offset, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m617[0m[39m:         start_offset = end_offset + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m618[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m619[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m620[0m[39m:     [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m572[0m[39m: [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m573[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m574[0m[39m: static void[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m575[0m[39m: [0m[1;35mdissect_irc_list[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, proto_item *item, int offset[0m[1;39m)[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m576[0m[39m: [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m577[0m[39m:     proto_tree *tree;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m578[0m[39m:     int start_offset;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m579[0m[39m:     int end_offset;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m580[0m[39m:     int length;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m581[0m[39m:     uint8_t *channel_name;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m582[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m583[0m[39m:     if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_get_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[32m'#'[0m[1;39m)[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m584[0m[39m:         return;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m585[0m[39m:     [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m586[0m[39m:     channel_name = [0m[1;35mmalloc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m587[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m588[0m[39m:     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name == NULL [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m589[0m[39m:         return;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m590[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m591[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m592[0m[39m:     start_offset = offset;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m593[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m594[0m[39m:     tree = [0m[1;35mproto_item_add_subtree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mitem, ett_irc_request_command_list[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis Summary[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe evaluation report identifies a **heap-buffer-overflow** vulnerability in the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mWireshark IRC protocol dissector, specifically in the `dissect_irc_names` function [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mat line [0m[1;36m563[0m[39m of `epan/dissectors/packet-irc.c`. The analysis reveals this is [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mactually a **systematic vulnerability** affecting three functions:[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. `dissect_irc_names` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m526[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m572[0m[1;39m)[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. `dissect_irc_join` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m331[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m379[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. `dissect_irc_part` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m382[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m447[0m[1;39m)[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Root Cause[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAll three functions exhibit the same flawed pattern:[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Allocate buffer based on FIRST channel name length** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcapped at [0m[1;36m50[0m[39m bytes via [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCHANNELLEN constant[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Calculate total length spanning ALL comma-separated channel names**[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Copy ALL channels into undersized buffer** → Heap overflow[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIn the crash case:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Input: `NAMES #[0m[1;35maaa...[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m125[0m[39m [0m[32m'a'[0m[39ms[0m[1;39m)[0m[33m...[0m[39m,#hello\n`[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Buffer allocated: [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mCHANNELLEN + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Data copied: [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mentire channel list[0m[1;39m)[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Overflow: [0m[1;36m81[0m[39m bytes beyond allocated region**[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Critical Code Patterns Identified[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Vulnerable pattern [0m[1;39m([0m[39mrepeated 3x[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchannel_name = [0m[1;35mmalloc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;          [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Allocate [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m bytes[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Get full length [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start, length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m OVERFLOW[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Safe patterns found in codebase:**[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Pattern [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m: Use tvb_get_string_enc with wmem pool[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstr = [0m[1;35mtvb_get_string_enc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpinfo->pool, tvb, offset, len, ENC_ASCII|ENC_NA[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Pattern [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m: Add items directly from tvb [0m[1;39m([0m[39mzero-copy[0m[1;39m)[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_field, tvb, offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Primary Fix Approach: Replace Manual Memory Management with Wireshark wmem API[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fix will replace the unsafe `malloc/tvb_memcpy/free` pattern with Wireshark's [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msafe `tvb_get_string_enc` API that uses wmem pools for automatic memory management.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#### Step [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m: Fix `dissect_irc_names` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m526[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m572[0m[1;39m)[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Current vulnerable code:**[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchannel_name = [0m[1;35mmalloc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name == NULL[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    return;[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[33m...[0m[39m later [0m[33m...[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m OVERFLOW[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Replacement approach:**[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Calculate the actual length of the full channel list first[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mint full_length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Safely extract the entire channel list using wmem[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muint8_t *channel_list = [0m[1;35mtvb_get_string_enc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, tvb, [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                                           start_offset, full_length, [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                                           ENC_ASCII|ENC_NA[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Detailed changes for `dissect_irc_names`:**[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Remove lines [0m[1;36m537[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m541[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmalloc and NULL check[0m[1;39m)[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. After line [0m[1;36m543[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`start_offset = offset;`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, add:[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Calculate full length: `int full_length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Safe extraction: `uint8_t *channel_list = [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mtvb_get_string_enc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, tvb, start_offset, full_length, [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mENC_ASCII|ENC_NA[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - NULL check: `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m!channel_list[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. In the loop [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m547[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m568[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - For individual channel extraction at line [0m[1;36m555[0m[39m: Change to use bounds-checked [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubstring copy[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - At line [0m[1;36m563[0m[39m: Replace `[0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith bounds-safe copy from `channel_list`[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Remove line [0m[1;36m570[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m since wmem handles cleanup[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Alternative simpler fix** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mif maintaining exact current logic[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Line [0m[1;36m537[0m[39m: Change `channel_name = [0m[1;35mmalloc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` to:[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```c[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  int full_length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  channel_name = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, full_length + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Remove line [0m[1;36m570[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfree call[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m since wmem auto-cleans[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#### Step [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m: Fix `dissect_irc_join` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m331[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m379[0m[1;39m)[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mApply identical pattern to `dissect_irc_join`:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Locate line [0m[1;36m344[0m[39m: `channel_name = [0m[1;35mmalloc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Replace with:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```c[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   int full_length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   channel_name = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, full_length + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m!channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. The bounds checks at lines [0m[1;36m362[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m370[0m[39m using `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` should be [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mupdated to use `full_length`[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Remove line [0m[1;36m377[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m[1;39m)[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#### Step [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m: Fix `dissect_irc_part` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m382[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m447[0m[1;39m)[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mApply identical pattern to `dissect_irc_part`:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Locate line [0m[1;36m393[0m[39m: `channel_name = [0m[1;35mmalloc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Replace with:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```c[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   int full_length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   channel_name = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, full_length + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m!channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Update bounds checks at lines [0m[1;36m414[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m426[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m438[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Remove line [0m[1;36m445[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m[1;39m)[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#### Step [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m: Review and Fix `dissect_irc_list` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m575[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m622[0m[1;39m)[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis function also uses `CHANNELLEN` but appears to have better bounds checking. [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHowever:[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Verify CHANNELLEN is properly defined [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m139[0m[39m: `#define CHANNELLEN [0m[1;36m50[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. The bounds checks at lines [0m[1;36m604[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m613[0m[39m should prevent overflow[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Consider replacing malloc/free pattern here too for consistency:[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```c[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   channel_name = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Remove line [0m[1;36m620[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m[1;39m)[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Implementation Details[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**For all functions:**[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Include wmem scope header** [0m[1;39m([0m[39malready included via `epan/packet.h`[0m[1;39m)[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Use `[0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`** instead of `pinfo->pool` since these functions [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreceive `proto_item` not `packet_info`[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Maintain existing logic** for:[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Channel validation [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35mtvb_get_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[32m'#'[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Comma-separated parsing loops[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Protocol tree item addition[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Text appending to tree items[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Add bounds validation** when calculating lengths:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```c[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   int full_length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfull_length <= [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m || full_length > [0m[1;36m4096[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Sanity check[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       return;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Update memset calls** to match new buffer sizes[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Benefits of This Approach[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Fixes the vulnerability**: Allocates correct size based on actual data length[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Follows Wireshark standards**: Uses wmem instead of raw malloc/free[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Automatic cleanup**: No memory leaks even if exceptions occur during [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdissection[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Maintains existing functionality**: Parsing logic remains unchanged[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Minimal code changes**: Only affects buffer allocation/deallocation[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **Consistent with codebase**: Matches patterns used elsewhere in packet-irc.c[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Testing Considerations[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fix must support the same fuzzing logic:[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Handle the crash input: `NAMES #[0m[1;35maaa...[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m125[0m[39m chars[0m[1;39m)[0m[33m...[0m[39m,#hello\n`[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Process single channels correctly[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Process comma-separated lists correctly[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Handle edge cases [0m[1;39m([0m[39mempty channels, very long names[0m[1;39m)[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Maintain protocol tree structure[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Preserve all existing dissection features[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Side Effects and Mitigations[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Potential side effects:**[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Memory usage**: Allocates based on actual data length [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcould be larger than [0m[1;36m51[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbytes[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Mitigation**: Add reasonable upper bound check [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., [0m[1;36m4096[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to prevent[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexcessive allocation[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Performance**: wmem allocation is slightly different from malloc[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Mitigation**: Negligible impact, wmem is optimized for packet processing[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Compatibility**: Changed from malloc to wmem[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Mitigation**: Standard Wireshark practice, no compatibility issues[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Code References[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis fix strategy is based on safe patterns already used in packet-irc.c:[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Line [0m[1;36m154[0m[39m: `tvb_get_string_enc` usage with `pinfo->pool`[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Line [0m[1;36m157[0m[39m: Same safe pattern[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Line [0m[1;36m490[0m[39m: Direct tvb item addition without copying[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fix eliminates the fundamental mismatch between allocation size [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfirst channel[0m[1;39m)[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand copy size [0m[1;39m([0m[39mall channels[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, replacing it with a single calculation based on the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mactual data length to be processed.[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
