[2;36m                    [0m         - [1m{[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -     proto_tree *tree;                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -     int start_offset;                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -     int end_offset;                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -     int length;                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -     uint8_t *channel_name;                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -     if [1m([0m[1;35mtvb_get_uint8[0m[1m([0mtvb, offset[1m)[0m != [32m'#'[0m[1m)[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -         return;                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -     start_offset = offset;                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -     channel_name = [1;35mmalloc[0m[1m([0mCHANNELLEN+[1;36m1[0m[1m)[0m;                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -     if [1m([0mchannel_name == NULL [1m)[0m [1m{[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -         return;                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -     [1m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -     tree = [1;35mproto_item_add_subtree[0m[1m([0mitem, ett_irc_request_command_join[1m)[0m;            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -     [35m/[0m* Parse the channels to join*[35m/[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -     [1;35mwhile[0m[1m([0m[1;35mtvb_offset_exists[0m[1m([0mtvb, start_offset[1m)[0m [1m)[0m [1m{[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -         [35m/[0m[35m/[0m Find the comma                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -         length = [1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1m([0mtvb, start_offset[1m)[0m;                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -         end_offset = [1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1m([0mtvb, start_offset, length, [32m','[0m[1m)[0m;              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -         if [1m([0m end_offset == [1;36m-1[0m [1m)[0m [1m{[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -             [1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1m([0mtree, hf_irc_request_command_join_channel, tvb,   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         start_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[1m)[0m;                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -             [1;35mmemset[0m[1m([0mchannel_name, [1;36m0[0m, CHANNELLEN+[1;36m1[0m[1m)[0m;                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -             [1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1m([0mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [1m([0mlength [1m<[0m[39m CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-         [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-         [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- static void[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m[1;35mdissect_irc_part[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, proto_item *item, int offset[0m[1;39m)[0m                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-     if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_get_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[32m'#'[0m[1;39m)[0m                                        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-         return;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-         length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-         end_offset = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m','[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             int start_message = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m':'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             length = start_message-start_offset;[0m                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+static void[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_join[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, proto_item *item, int offset[0m[1;39m)[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_get_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[32m'#'[0m[1;39m)[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    channel_name = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name == NULL [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    tree = [0m[1;35mproto_item_add_subtree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mitem, ett_irc_request_command_join[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Parse the channels to join*[0m[35m/[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;35mwhile[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_offset_exists[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Find the comma[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        end_offset = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m','[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m end_offset == [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_join_channel, tvb, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            return;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        copy_length = end_offset - start_offset;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcopy_length < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcopy_length : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_join_channel, tvb, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, copy_length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        start_offset = end_offset + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    return;[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+static void[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_part[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, proto_item *item, int offset[0m[1;39m)[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    proto_tree *tree;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    int start_offset;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    int end_offset;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    int length;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    int copy_length;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    uint8_t *channel_name;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_get_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[32m'#'[0m[1;39m)[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    channel_name = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name == NULL [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    start_offset = offset;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    tree = [0m[1;35mproto_item_add_subtree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mitem, ett_irc_request_command_part[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;35mwhile[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_offset_exists[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        end_offset = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m','[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m end_offset == [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            int start_message = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m':'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_part_channel, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtvb, start_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_part_channel, tvb, [0m   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_message[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m,[0m[1;36m0x65[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x6c[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x6c[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x6f[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0xa[0m[39m,[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNAMES [0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa,#hello\[0m[1;36m012[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/user/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mwireshark[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpjtrn_6xz[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandler_irc -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is a heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability in the Wireshark IRC [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdissector, specifically in the `dissect_irc_names` function. The AddressSanitizer [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdetected a write of [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes at an address that is located [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m bytes after a [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated region, indicating a buffer overflow. The patch attempted to fix similar [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39missues in the `dissect_irc_join` and `dissect_irc_part` functions by replacing [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`malloc/free` with Wireshark's memory management functions and fixing length [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalculations. However, the patch failed to resolve the issue, as the same [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow error persists in the `dissect_irc_names` function after [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mapplying the patch.[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue manifests as a heap-buffer-overflow detected by AddressSanitizer [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mduring fuzzing of the IRC protocol handler. The key details are:[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Error Location**: The overflow occurs in `dissect_irc_names` at line [0m[1;36m563[0m[39m of [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`epan/dissectors/packet-irc.c`[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Error Type**: WRITE of size [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m at address `[0m[1;36m0x5060001c64f3[0m[39m`[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Allocated Region**: The problematic address is located [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m bytes after a [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mregion allocated at `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x5060001c64c0[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x5060001c64f3[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Allocation Site**: The memory was allocated in `dissect_irc_names` at line [0m[1;36m537[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39musing `malloc`[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Test Input**: The triggering input is `NAMES [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa,#hello\n` - a NAMES command with a very [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlong channel name followed by a comma and another channel name[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe call stack shows:[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `__asan_memcpy` → `memcpy` → `tvb_memcpy` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mat tvbuff.[0m[1;92mc:945[0m[1;39m)[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `dissect_irc_names` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mat packet-irc.[0m[1;92mc:563[0m[1;39m)[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `dissect_irc_request_command` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mat packet-irc.[0m[1;92mc:702[0m[1;39m)[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `dissect_irc_request` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mat packet-irc.[0m[1;92mc:811[0m[1;39m)[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `dissect_irc` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mat packet-irc.[0m[1;92mc:1114[0m[1;39m)[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch modified two functions in `epan/dissectors/packet-irc.c`:[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **`dissect_irc_join` function** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m330[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m377[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Replaced `[0m[1;35mmalloc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` with `[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` for memory allocation[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Removed all `[0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` calls[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Introduced a new variable `copy_length` to calculate the actual length between[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`start_offset` and `end_offset`[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Changed the length calculation for the second `tvb_memcpy` call from using [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`length` to using `copy_length = end_offset - start_offset`[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Updated the corresponding `proto_tree_add_item` call to use `copy_length` [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minstead of `length`[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **`dissect_irc_part` function** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m379[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m445[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Applied similar changes as in `dissect_irc_join`[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Replaced `malloc` with `wmem_alloc`[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Removed `free` calls[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Introduced `copy_length` variable[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Fixed the length calculation for copying channel names in the loop[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Changed `proto_tree_add_item` from using `hf_irc_request_command_join_channel`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto `hf_irc_request_command_part_channel`[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch also includes reformatting with consistent indentation and spacing.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Result[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the same heap-buffer-overflow error persists:[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Same Error Location**: The overflow still occurs in `dissect_irc_names` at [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m562[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline number shifted by [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m due to the patch[0m[1;39m)[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Same Allocation Site**: Memory is still allocated at line [0m[1;36m536[0m[39m using `malloc`[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Identical Test Input**: The same test case triggers the error[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Same Error Pattern**: WRITE of size [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m at address `[0m[1;36m0x5060001c64f3[0m[39m`, which is [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m0[0m[39m bytes after a [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte region[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe key observation is that while the patch modified `dissect_irc_join` and [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`dissect_irc_part` functions, the actual vulnerability is in the [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`dissect_irc_names` function, which was not modified by the patch.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas for Further Investigation[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo obtain a holistic view of the issues, the following parts of the codebase should[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbe investigated:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **`dissect_irc_names` function** [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround lines [0m[1;36m536[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m563[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: This is the actual [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlocation of the vulnerability and was not addressed by the patch. The function [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlikely has similar buffer overflow issues as the patched functions.[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **CHANNELLEN constant definition**: Understanding the value of this constant and[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhow it relates to the maximum IRC channel name length is crucial.[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **All functions using `malloc/free` pattern in packet-irc.c**: The patch [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdemonstrates awareness of the need to replace manual memory management, but this [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmay be a pattern repeated throughout the file.[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Length calculation logic**: The issue appears to stem from incorrect length [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalculations when copying data. The pattern of calculating `length = [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and then using `end_offset = [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` needs careful review across all similar functions.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **tvb_memcpy usage patterns**: All calls to `tvb_memcpy` in the IRC dissector [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mshould be reviewed to ensure the copy length does not exceed the allocated buffer [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msize.[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. **IRC protocol specifications**: Understanding the maximum allowed lengths for [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvarious IRC protocol elements [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel names, nicknames, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m would help ensure [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mproper buffer sizing.[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mhandler_irc[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m356[0m[39m:         end_offset = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m','[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m390[0m[39m:     if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_get_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[32m'#'[0m[1;39m)[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m391[0m[39m:         return;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m393[0m[39m:     channel_name = [0m[1;35mmalloc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m374[0m[39m:         start_offset = end_offset + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m375[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m379[0m[39m: [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
