[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    uint8_t *channel_name;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_get_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[32m'#'[0m[1;39m)[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    start_offset = offset;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    channel_name = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name == NULL [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    tree = [0m[1;35mproto_item_add_subtree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mitem, ett_irc_request_command_join[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Parse the channels to join*[0m[35m/[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;35mwhile[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_offset_exists[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Find the comma[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        end_offset = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m','[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m end_offset == [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_join_channel, tvb, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            return;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        copy_length = end_offset - start_offset;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcopy_length < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcopy_length : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_join_channel, tvb, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, copy_length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        start_offset = end_offset + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    return;[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+static void[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_part[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, proto_item *item, int offset[0m[1;39m)[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    proto_tree *tree;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    int start_offset;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    int end_offset;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    int length;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    int copy_length;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    uint8_t *channel_name;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_get_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[32m'#'[0m[1;39m)[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    channel_name = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name == NULL [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    start_offset = offset;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    tree = [0m[1;35mproto_item_add_subtree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mitem, ett_irc_request_command_part[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;35mwhile[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_offset_exists[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        end_offset = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m','[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m end_offset == [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            int start_message = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m':'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m start_message == [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_part_channel, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtvb, start_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m? length : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                return;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            length = start_message-start_offset;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_part_channel, tvb, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            start_message++;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_message[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_part_message, tvb, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_message, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            return;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        copy_length = end_offset - start_offset;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcopy_length < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcopy_length : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_part_channel, tvb, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, copy_length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        start_offset = end_offset + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    return;[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Heap left redzone:       fa[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Freed heap region:       fd[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack left redzone:      f1[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack mid redzone:       f2[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack right redzone:     f3[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack after return:      f5[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack use after scope:   f8[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Global redzone:          f9[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Global init order:       f6[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Poisoned by user:        f7[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Container overflow:      fc[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Array cookie:            ac[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Intra object redzone:    bb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ASan internal:           fe[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Left alloca redzone:     ca[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mMS: [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ; base unit: [0m[1;36m0000000000000000000000000000000000000000[0m                         [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m,[0m[1;36m0x65[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x6c[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x6c[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x6f[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0xa[0m[39m,[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNAMES [0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa,#hello\[0m[1;36m012[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/user/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mwireshark[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpjtrn_6xz[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandler_irc -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is a heap-buffer-overflow detected by AddressSanitizer in the IRC[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpacket dissector of Wireshark. The vulnerability occurs in the `dissect_irc_names` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction when processing IRC NAMES commands with maliciously crafted input. The [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatch attempted to fix similar issues in the `dissect_irc_join` and [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`dissect_irc_part` functions by replacing `malloc`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`free` with Wireshark's memory [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmanagement functions and fixing buffer size calculations. However, the patch did [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnot resolve the original issue, as the same heap-buffer-overflow continues to occur[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min the `dissect_irc_names` function, which was not modified by the patch.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue Analysis[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe AddressSanitizer report reveals a heap-buffer-overflow occurring during the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprocessing of an IRC NAMES command. The vulnerability manifests with the following [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcharacteristics:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Crash Details:**[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Type**: WRITE of size [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m at address [0m[1;36m0x5060001c64f3[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Location**: The overflow occurs in a [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte allocated buffer, with the write [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccurring immediately after the end of the buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0[0m[39m bytes after[0m[1;39m)[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Scariness Score**: [0m[1;36m45[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmulti-byte-write-heap-buffer-overflow[0m[1;39m)[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Call Stack:**[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe crash occurs through the following sequence:[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. `dissect_irc` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m1114[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - Entry point for IRC dissection[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. `dissect_irc_request` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m811[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - Processes IRC requests[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. `dissect_irc_request_command` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m702[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - Handles specific IRC commands[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. `dissect_irc_names` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m563[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - Processes NAMES command [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhere the overflow [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccurs[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. `tvb_memcpy` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m945[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - Performs the problematic memory copy[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. `memcpy` - The actual overflow happens here[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Memory Allocation:**[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe problematic buffer is allocated at line [0m[1;36m537[0m[39m in `dissect_irc_names` using [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmalloc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, resulting in a [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte allocation [0m[1;39m([0m[39mCHANNELLEN appears to be[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m50[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Test Case:**[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe input that triggers the crash is:[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNAMES [0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa,#hello[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis consists of a NAMES command followed by a channel name with [0m[1;36m125[0m[39m [0m[32m'a'[0m[39m [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcharacters, then a comma and another channel name.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt Analysis[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch modifies two functions: `dissect_irc_join` and `dissect_irc_part`. The [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mkey changes include:[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Memory Management Change:**[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Replaced `[0m[1;35mmalloc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` with `[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Removed corresponding `[0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` calls[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This aligns with Wireshark's preferred memory management using wmem allocators[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Buffer Size Calculation Fix:**[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added a new variable `copy_length` to properly calculate the length between [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset and end_offset[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Changed from using `length` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich is the remaining buffer length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`copy_length = end_offset - start_offset` when copying data between delimiters[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This ensures that only the actual substring length is copied, not the entire [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mremaining buffer[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Code Formatting:**[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Minor whitespace and indentation adjustments[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Result Analysis[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the **same heap-buffer-overflow continues to occur** with[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39midentical characteristics:[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same crash location: `dissect_irc_names` at line [0m[1;36m562[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffset by [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m line due to [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatch changes[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same allocation location: line [0m[1;36m536[0m[39m in `dissect_irc_names`[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same write size: [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes into a [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte buffer[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same test case triggers the crash[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same memory address and overflow pattern[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Critical Observation:** The patch did not modify the `dissect_irc_names` [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction, which is where the actual overflow occurs. The patch only addressed [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`dissect_irc_join` and `dissect_irc_part` functions, leaving the vulnerable code [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpath untouched.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Code Areas Requiring Investigation[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo understand the complete issue, the following areas should be examined:[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **`dissect_irc_names` function** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprimary concern[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Located around line [0m[1;36m536[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m563[0m[39m in `epan/dissectors/packet-irc.c`[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This function contains the actual vulnerable code that allocates [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m bytes but [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mattempts to write [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The logic for parsing NAMES command responses and calculating buffer sizes [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mneeds review[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Similar patterns to `dissect_irc_join` and `dissect_irc_part` may exist here[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **CHANNELLEN constant definition**:[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The value of CHANNELLEN [0m[1;39m([0m[39mappears to be [0m[1;36m50[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m should be verified against IRC [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprotocol specifications[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This constant is used throughout the IRC dissector for buffer allocations[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Buffer size calculation in `dissect_irc_names`**:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The code likely has a similar issue to what was patched in `dissect_irc_join` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand `dissect_irc_part`[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - When parsing comma-separated channel names, the length calculation before [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tvb_memcpy` is probably incorrect[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - It may be using `[0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` instead of calculating the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mactual substring length[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Other IRC dissector functions**:[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Functions like `dissect_irc_privmsg`, `dissect_irc_topic`, and others that [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparse channel names or comma-separated lists[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - These may have similar vulnerabilities that need to be addressed [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcomprehensively[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **tvb_memcpy usage pattern**:[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All instances where `tvb_memcpy` is called with a calculated length that might[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexceed the destination buffer size[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The pattern of using `[0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` vs calculating actual [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubstring lengths[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
