[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m580[0m[39m:     int length;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m581[0m[39m:     uint8_t *channel_name;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m582[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m583[0m[39m:     if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_get_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[32m'#'[0m[1;39m)[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m584[0m[39m:         return;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m585[0m[39m:     [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m586[0m[39m:     channel_name = [0m[1;35mmalloc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m587[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m588[0m[39m:     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name == NULL [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m589[0m[39m:         return;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m590[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m591[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m592[0m[39m:     start_offset = offset;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m593[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m594[0m[39m:     tree = [0m[1;35mproto_item_add_subtree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mitem, ett_irc_request_command_list[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m595[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m596[0m[39m:     [0m[1;35mwhile[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_offset_exists[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m597[0m[39m:         length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m598[0m[39m:         end_offset = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m','[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m599[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m600[0m[39m:         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m end_offset == [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m601[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_list_channel, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtvb, start_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m602[0m[39m:             [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m603[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m604[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m? length : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m605[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m606[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m607[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m608[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m609[0m[39m:             return;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m610[0m[39m:         [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m611[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m612[0m[39m:         [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m613[0m[39m:         [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend_offset-start_offset <[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? end_offset-start_offset : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m614[0m[39m:         [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m615[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m616[0m[39m:         [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_list_channel, tvb, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, end_offset-start_offset, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m617[0m[39m:         start_offset = end_offset + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m618[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m619[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m620[0m[39m:     [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m621[0m[39m:     return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m622[0m[39m: [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Core Issue Identification[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe evaluation report clearly identifies that the **previous patch did not address [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe actual vulnerable function**. The patch modified `dissect_irc_join` and [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`dissect_irc_part`, but the heap-buffer-overflow occurs in `dissect_irc_names` [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhich was not modified.[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Root Cause in `dissect_irc_names` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m563[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mWhen parsing comma-separated channel names:[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Buffer allocated: [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` where `[0m[33mCHANNELLEN[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m50[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `length` = `[0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mentire remaining [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer = ~[0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Attempts to copy [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes into [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte buffer → heap-buffer-overflow[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe correct calculation should be `end_offset - start_offset` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe actual channel [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mname length between delimiters[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, limited to `CHANNELLEN`.[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Reference Implementation[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe codebase already contains the **correct pattern** in `dissect_irc_list` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m613[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend_offset-start_offset < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m? end_offset-start_offset : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Comprehensive Scope[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAnalysis reveals **three additional functions** with similar vulnerabilities:[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `dissect_irc_names` - **CRITICAL** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcrashes in the test case[0m[1;39m)[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `dissect_irc_join` - **vulnerable** [0m[1;39m([0m[39muses wrong `length` variable at lines [0m[1;36m370[0m[39m, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m373[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `dissect_irc_part` - **vulnerable** [0m[1;39m([0m[39muses wrong `length` variable at lines [0m[1;36m438[0m[39m, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m441[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `dissect_irc_list` - **partially correct** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhas correct bounds checking but uses [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmalloc/free[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAll four functions must be fixed to prevent similar issues and align with [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mWireshark's memory management practices.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m: Fix `dissect_irc_names` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mPrimary Fix - Resolves the Crash[0m[1;39m)[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIn the comma-separated parsing loop [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter line [0m[1;36m560[0m[39m, before line [0m[1;36m562[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Add variable: `int copy_length = end_offset - start_offset;`[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. At line [0m[1;36m563[0m[39m, change from:[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```c[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   To:[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```c[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcopy_length < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcopy_length : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis ensures only the actual channel name substring [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbetween `start_offset` and [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`end_offset`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is copied, limited to the buffer size.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m: Apply Same Pattern to `dissect_irc_join`[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe previous patch attempted to fix this but used the wrong approach. Revert those [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchanges and apply the correct fix:[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIn the comma-separated parsing loop [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter line [0m[1;36m367[0m[39m, before line [0m[1;36m369[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Add variable: `int copy_length = end_offset - start_offset;`[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. At line [0m[1;36m370[0m[39m, change from:[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```c[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? length : [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   To:[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```c[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcopy_length < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcopy_length : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. At line [0m[1;36m373[0m[39m, change `length` to `copy_length` in the `proto_tree_add_item` call[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m: Apply Same Pattern to `dissect_irc_part`[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIn the comma-separated parsing loop [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter line [0m[1;36m435[0m[39m, before line [0m[1;36m437[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Add variable: `int copy_length = end_offset - start_offset;`[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. At line [0m[1;36m438[0m[39m, change from:[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```c[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? length : [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   To:[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```c[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcopy_length < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcopy_length : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. At line [0m[1;36m441[0m[39m, change `length` to `copy_length` in the `proto_tree_add_item` call[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m: Memory Management Conversion for All Four Functions[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mReplace malloc/free with Wireshark's wmem allocator in all four functions:[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**For each function:**[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Change allocation from:[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```c[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   channel_name = [0m[1;35mmalloc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   To:[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```c[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   channel_name = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Remove all `[0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;` calls [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwmem_packet_scope automatically frees at[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mend of packet dissection[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Specific lines to modify:**[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `dissect_irc_join`: Line [0m[1;36m344[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mallocation[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, remove lines [0m[1;36m365[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m377[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrees[0m[1;39m)[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `dissect_irc_part`: Line [0m[1;36m393[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mallocation[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, remove lines [0m[1;36m417[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m433[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m445[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrees[0m[1;39m)[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `dissect_irc_names`: Line [0m[1;36m537[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mallocation[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, remove lines [0m[1;36m558[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m570[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrees[0m[1;39m)[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `dissect_irc_list`: Line [0m[1;36m586[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mallocation[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, remove lines [0m[1;36m607[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m620[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrees[0m[1;39m)[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m: Variable Declaration Order[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mFor each modified function, ensure the new `copy_length` variable is declared at [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe function beginning with other variables for proper C89/C90 compliance [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mWireshark coding standards[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Modified variable declarations:**[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mproto_tree *tree;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mint start_offset;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mint end_offset;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mint length;[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mint copy_length;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Add this line[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muint8_t *channel_name;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why This is Optimal[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Addresses Root Cause**: Directly fixes the buffer overflow by calculating the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcorrect substring length instead of using the entire remaining buffer length.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Follows Existing Pattern**: Uses the same solution already implemented [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcorrectly in `dissect_irc_list` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m613[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, ensuring consistency across the [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcodebase.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Comprehensive Coverage**: Fixes all four similar functions to prevent future [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39missues and eliminate technical debt.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Aligns with Wireshark Standards**: Replaces malloc/free with wmem allocators, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhich is the preferred memory management approach in Wireshark dissectors.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Preserves Functionality**: The fix maintains all existing parsing logic and [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdisplay functionality - only corrects the length calculation.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Preserves Logic[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- All proto_tree_add_item calls remain functional[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Channel name display [0m[1;39m([0m[39mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m continues to work[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Comma-separated list parsing logic unchanged[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Edge cases [0m[1;39m([0m[39mno comma found, empty channels[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m handled identically[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Side Effects and Mitigation[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Potential Side Effects:**[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Truncation of long channel names**: Channel names longer than [0m[1;36m50[0m[39m characters [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwill be truncated to [0m[1;36m50[0m[39m chars in the display string[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Mitigation**: This is intentional and matches the IRC protocol specification[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mRFC [0m[1;36m2812[0m[39m defines CHANNELLEN as [0m[1;36m50[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The proto_tree will still show the full channel name, only the appended text [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis truncated[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Memory behavior change**: Using wmem_packet_scope instead of malloc[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Mitigation**: This is the standard Wireshark approach and actually improves [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmemory safety by preventing leaks if early returns occur[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**No Breaking Changes:**[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Existing tests remain valid [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe functions accept and return the same data types[0m[1;39m)[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Protocol tree structure unchanged[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Display format identical [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexcept for proper handling of oversized inputs[0m[1;39m)[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Similar Solutions in Codebase[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fix directly mirrors the existing correct implementation in `dissect_irc_list` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mat line [0m[1;36m613[0m[39m, confirming this is the established pattern for this codebase. Multiple[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mother Wireshark dissectors use wmem_alloc with wmem_packet_scope [0m[1;39m([0m[39mas shown in [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpacket-cops.c, packet-rk512.c, packet-tipc.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, validating the memory management [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mapproach.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-     tree = [0m[1;35mproto_item_add_subtree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mitem, ett_irc_request_command_join[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-     [0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Parse the channels to join*[0m[35m/[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-     [0m[1;35mwhile[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_offset_exists[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-         [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Find the comma[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-         length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-         end_offset = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m','[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m end_offset == [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_join_channel, tvb, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-                 [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m? length : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-                 [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             length = start_message-start_offset;[0m                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-             [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    tree = [0m[1;35mproto_item_add_subtree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mitem, ett_irc_request_command_join[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Parse the channels to join*[0m[35m/[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;35mwhile[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_offset_exists[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Find the comma[0m                                                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        end_offset = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m','[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m end_offset == [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_join_channel, tvb, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            return;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        copy_length = end_offset - start_offset;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcopy_length < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcopy_length : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_join_channel, tvb, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, copy_length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        start_offset = end_offset + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    return;[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+static void[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_part[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, proto_item *item, int offset[0m[1;39m)[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    proto_tree *tree;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    int start_offset;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    int end_offset;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    int length;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    int copy_length;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    uint8_t *channel_name;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_get_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[32m'#'[0m[1;39m)[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    channel_name = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name == NULL [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    start_offset = offset;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    tree = [0m[1;35mproto_item_add_subtree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mitem, ett_irc_request_command_part[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;35mwhile[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_offset_exists[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        end_offset = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m','[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m end_offset == [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            int start_message = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m':'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m start_message == [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_part_channel, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtvb, start_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m? length : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            length = start_message-start_offset;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_part_channel, tvb, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            start_message++;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_message[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
