[2;36m                    [0m         [39m,[0m[1;36m0x65[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x6c[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x6c[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0x6f[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m0xa[0m[39m,[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNAMES [0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa,#hello\[0m[1;36m012[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/user/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mwireshark[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpjtrn_6xz[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandler_irc -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue reveals a heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability in the IRC protocol [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdissector of Wireshark, specifically in the `dissect_irc_names` function. The [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow occurs when writing [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes to a [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte allocated buffer. The patch [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mattempt modified the `dissect_irc_join` and `dissect_irc_part` functions by [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreplacing `malloc/free` with Wireshark's memory management [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`wmem_alloc`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfixing length calculations. However, the patch did not resolve the issue, as the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msame heap-buffer-overflow continues to occur in the `dissect_irc_names` function [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith identical characteristics.[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue Analysis[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fuzzer detected a heap-buffer-overflow in the IRC dissector with the following [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcharacteristics:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Error Type**: AddressSanitizer detected a WRITE operation of [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes at [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maddress `[0m[1;36m0x5060001c64f3[0m[39m`[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **SCARINESS Score**: [0m[1;36m45[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmulti-byte-write-heap-buffer-overflow[0m[1;39m)[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Call Stack**: The overflow occurs in:[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `__asan_memcpy` → `memcpy` → `tvb_memcpy` → `dissect_irc_names` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m563[0m[1;39m)[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Called from `dissect_irc_request_command` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m702[0m[1;39m)[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Called from `dissect_irc_request` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m811[0m[1;39m)[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Called from `dissect_irc` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m1114[0m[1;39m)[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Memory Allocation**: The buffer was allocated as a [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte region [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x5060001c64c0[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x5060001c64f3[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at line [0m[1;36m537[0m[39m in `dissect_irc_names` using [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`malloc`[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Test Case**: The input that triggers the bug is:[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   NAMES [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa,#hello\n[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   This consists of a NAMES command followed by a channel name with [0m[1;36m125[0m[39m [0m[32m'a'[0m[39m [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcharacters, then a comma, then another channel [0m[32m"#hello"[0m[39m.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt Details[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch modified two functions [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`dissect_irc_join` and `dissect_irc_part`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m with [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe following changes:[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Memory Management**: Replaced `malloc/free` calls with [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and removed corresponding `free` [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalls[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Length Calculation**: Added a new variable `copy_length` to properly calculate[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe length between start_offset and end_offset: `copy_length = end_offset - [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset`[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Buffer Copy**: Used `copy_length` instead of `length` when copying data before[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfinding the comma delimiter[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Post-Patch Results[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the same error persists with nearly identical [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcharacteristics:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Error Location**: Still in `dissect_irc_names` at line [0m[1;36m562[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpreviously line [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m563[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Same Memory Region**: The vulnerable buffer is still allocated as a [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mregion at the same relative address[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Same Allocation Location**: Line [0m[1;36m536[0m[39m in `dissect_irc_names` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpreviously line [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m537[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Same Call Stack**: The error propagates through the exact same function call [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchain[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Identical Test Case**: The same input triggers the vulnerability[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe line number shifts [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m563[0m[39m→[0m[1;36m562[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m537[0m[39m→[0m[1;36m536[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m702[0m[39m→[0m[1;36m701[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m811[0m[39m→[0m[1;36m810[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m1114[0m[39m→[0m[1;36m1113[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m indicate the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatch was applied, but the fundamental issue remains unresolved.[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas Requiring Investigation[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe following areas of the codebase should be investigated to understand the [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcomplete scope of the issue:[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **`dissect_irc_names` Function** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m530[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m570[0m[39m approximately in [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`epan/dissectors/packet-irc.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This is where the actual buffer overflow occurs[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The buffer allocation logic at line [0m[1;36m536[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m537[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `tvb_memcpy` operation at line [0m[1;36m562[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m563[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The length calculations that determine how much data is copied[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **CHANNELLEN Constant Definition**:[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The value of `CHANNELLEN` which determines the buffer size[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Where this constant is defined and whether it's appropriate for IRC channel [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnames according to the protocol specification[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Related Functions** that may have similar patterns:[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `dissect_irc_join` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmodified by the patch[0m[1;39m)[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `dissect_irc_part` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmodified by the patch[0m[1;39m)[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Any other IRC dissector functions that parse channel names or comma-separated [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlists[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Input Validation**:[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How the dissector handles channel names that exceed expected lengths[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Whether there are checks before copying data from the tvbuff to the allocated [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The logic that determines the length parameter passed to `tvb_memcpy`[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **IRC Protocol Specification Compliance**:[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - RFC [0m[1;36m1459[0m[39m and RFC [0m[1;36m2812[0m[39m specifications for IRC channel name lengths[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Whether the implementation correctly handles the maximum channel name length [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand multiple comma-separated channels[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch addressed potential issues in `dissect_irc_join` and `dissect_irc_part` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbut did not modify `dissect_irc_names`, where the actual overflow occurs. This [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexplains why the vulnerability persists after applying the patch.[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mhandler_irc[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m431[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_part_message, [0m    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m432[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m433[0m[39m:             [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m434[0m[39m:             return;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m435[0m[39m:         [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m436[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m437[0m[39m:         [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m438[0m[39m:         [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m439[0m[39m:         [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m440[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m441[0m[39m:         [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_join_channel, tvb, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m442[0m[39m:         start_offset = end_offset + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m443[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m444[0m[39m: [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m445[0m[39m:     [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m446[0m[39m:     return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m447[0m[39m: [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis of the Code Snippets in Relation to Evaluation Report[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Core Insights[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Root Cause Identified**: The heap-buffer-overflow in `dissect_irc_names` at [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m563[0m[39m occurs because it uses `length` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtotal remaining buffer size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m instead of [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`end_offset - start_offset` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mactual channel name length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m when copying data into a [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfixed-size buffer.[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Correct Reference Implementation**: The `dissect_irc_list` function [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m613[0m[1;39m)[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdemonstrates the correct pattern:[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```c[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend_offset-start_offset < [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? end_offset-start_offset : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Multiple Affected Functions**: The same bug exists in three functions:[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `dissect_irc_names` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m563[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - **Primary target in crash report**[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `dissect_irc_join` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m370[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m373[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - Modified by previous patch but still has[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe bug[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `dissect_irc_part` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m438[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m441[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - Modified by previous patch but still has[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe bug[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Previous Patch Analysis**: The last patch attempt modified `dissect_irc_join` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand `dissect_irc_part` by:[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Switching from `malloc/free` to `wmem_alloc` ✓ [0m[1;39m([0m[39mGood[0m[1;39m)[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Adding `copy_length = end_offset - start_offset` ✓ [0m[1;39m([0m[39mGood[0m[1;39m)[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **BUT**: Only applied the fix to the `proto_tree_add_item` calls, not to the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcritical `tvb_memcpy` calls where the overflow occurs[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The patch did not touch `dissect_irc_names` at all, which is where the fuzzer [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdetects the crash[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Critical Logic to Preserve**: [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The comma-separated channel list parsing logic must be maintained[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The protocol tree construction must remain functional[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Early return on [0m[32m'#'[0m[39m check must be preserved[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All existing functionality in JOIN, PART, NAMES, and LIST commands must [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcontinue working[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Root Cause Symptoms in Code[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe bug manifests at these specific locations:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**dissect_irc_names [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m563[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Uses wrong length![0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**dissect_irc_join [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m370[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? length : [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Uses wrong length![0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**dissect_irc_part [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m438[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:**[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? length : [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Uses wrong length![0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIn all three cases, when a comma is found [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`end_offset != [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the variable [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`length` contains `[0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, which is the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**entire remaining buffer**, not just the bytes until the comma. For the test input[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32m"NAMES #aaa...[0m[32m([0m[32m125 a's[0m[32m)[0m[32m...aaa,#hello\n"[0m[39m, this results in trying to copy [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minto a [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte buffer.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Comprehensive Fix Strategy[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m: Fix `dissect_irc_names` Function[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location**: `epan/dissectors/packet-irc.c`, lines [0m[1;36m525[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m572[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Changes Required**:[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Replace malloc with wmem_alloc** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m537[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Change: `channel_name = [0m[1;35mmalloc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - To: `channel_name = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Remove all [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m calls** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m558[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m570[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Delete: `[0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Reason: [0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m automatically frees memory when packet dissection [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcompletes[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Fix the critical buffer overflow** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m563[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Change: `[0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - To: `[0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend_offset-start_offset < [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? end_offset-start_offset : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This ensures we copy only the channel name [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrom start_offset to end_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnot the entire remaining buffer[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Why This Works**: [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- When a comma is found, `end_offset - start_offset` gives the exact length of the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchannel name before the comma[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The ternary operator ensures we never copy more than CHANNELLEN bytes[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This matches the proven-correct implementation in `dissect_irc_list`[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m: Complete the Fix for `dissect_irc_join` Function[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location**: `epan/dissectors/packet-irc.c`, lines [0m[1;36m330[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m379[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**The previous patch partially fixed this function but missed the critical [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtvb_memcpy call.**[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Reapply Previous Patch Changes**:[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Replace malloc with wmem_alloc [0m[1;39m([0m[39malready done in previous patch[0m[1;39m)[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Remove [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m calls [0m[1;39m([0m[39malready done in previous patch[0m[1;39m)[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Add `copy_length` variable [0m[1;39m([0m[39malready done in previous patch[0m[1;39m)[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Additional Critical Fix** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m370[0m[39m - NOT addressed by previous patch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Change: `[0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- To: `[0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcopy_length < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcopy_length : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The previous patch added `copy_length = end_offset - start_offset` but forgot to [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muse it in the tvb_memcpy call[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Fix proto_tree_add_item** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m373[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Already fixed in previous patch to use `copy_length` instead of `length` ✓[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m: Complete the Fix for `dissect_irc_part` Function[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location**: `epan/dissectors/packet-irc.c`, lines [0m[1;36m381[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m447[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Same issue as dissect_irc_join - previous patch was incomplete.**[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Reapply Previous Patch Changes**:[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Replace malloc with wmem_alloc [0m[1;39m([0m[39malready done[0m[1;39m)[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Remove [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m calls [0m[1;39m([0m[39malready done[0m[1;39m)[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Add `copy_length` variable [0m[1;39m([0m[39malready done[0m[1;39m)[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Additional Critical Fix** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m438[0m[39m - NOT addressed by previous patch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Change: `[0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- To: `[0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcopy_length < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcopy_length : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Fix proto_tree_add_item** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m441[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Already fixed in previous patch to use `copy_length` ✓[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Step [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m: Update `dissect_irc_list` for Consistency[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Location**: `epan/dissectors/packet-irc.c`, lines [0m[1;36m574[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m622[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mWhile this function is already correct in its length calculations, it should be [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mupdated for memory management consistency:[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Replace malloc with wmem_alloc** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m586[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Change: `channel_name = [0m[1;35mmalloc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - To: `channel_name = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Remove all [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m calls** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m607[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m620[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Delete: `[0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Keep the correct tvb_memcpy pattern** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m613[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No change needed - this is already correct and serves as our reference [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mimplementation[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Justification and Explanation[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why This is the Optimal Approach[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Addresses the Root Cause**: The fix directly addresses the calculation error [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat causes the buffer overflow by using `end_offset - start_offset` instead of the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtotal remaining buffer length.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Follows Wireshark Best Practices**: [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Uses wmem_alloc for memory management, preventing memory leaks[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Matches patterns used throughout the Wireshark codebase[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Consistent with the proven-correct implementation in `dissect_irc_list`[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Completes the Previous Incomplete Patch**: The previous patch introduced [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`copy_length` in JOIN and PART functions but failed to use it in the critical [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tvb_memcpy` calls. This patch completes that work.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Minimal and Focused Changes**: Only modifies the specific lines causing the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow, preserving all existing logic and functionality.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Preserves Existing Logic[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Parsing Logic Unchanged**: The while loop structure, comma detection, and [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprotocol tree construction remain identical[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **All Code Paths Preserved**: Early returns, null checks, and branching logic [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mare maintained[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Protocol Compliance Maintained**: Still correctly parses IRC channel names [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maccording to RFC specifications[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Backward Compatible**: The fix only changes internal buffer handling, not the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpublic API or protocol interpretation[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Addresses the Issues[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**For dissect_irc_names** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mPrimary crash location[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Before: Copies [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mentire remaining buffer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m into [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte buffer → OVERFLOW[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- After: Copies [0m[1;35mmin[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name_length, CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m bytes → SAFE[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**For dissect_irc_join and dissect_irc_part** [0m[1;39m([0m[39mSecondary vulnerable functions[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Previous patch added `copy_length` but didn't use it in tvb_memcpy[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This patch completes the fix by using `copy_length` in all necessary locations[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Memory Management**:[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Eliminates manual memory management errors[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Prevents leaks on early returns or exceptions[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Follows Wireshark conventions[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Potential Side Effects and Mitigation[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Side Effect [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m: Memory Allocation Behavior**[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Impact**: wmem_alloc may behave slightly differently than malloc in edge cases[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Mitigation**: This is standard Wireshark practice; wmem is designed as a [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdrop-in replacement with better error handling[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Side Effect [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m: Performance**[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Impact**: [0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m has small overhead for scope management[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Mitigation**: Negligible in packet dissection context; eliminates [0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverhead anyway[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Side Effect [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m: NULL Handling**[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Impact**: wmem_alloc handles NULL differently than malloc[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Mitigation**: Existing NULL checks remain in place for robustness[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Reference from Similar Code[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fix directly mirrors the proven-correct implementation in `dissect_irc_list` [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m613[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which already handles comma-separated channel lists correctly. This is [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe gold standard implementation within the same file that demonstrates the pattern[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mworks correctly.[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why Previous Patch Failed[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe previous patch made two critical mistakes:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Incomplete Variable Usage**: Added `copy_length = end_offset - start_offset` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbut only used it for `proto_tree_add_item`, not for the critical `tvb_memcpy` call [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat actually causes the overflow[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Wrong Function**: Did not modify `dissect_irc_names` at all, which is where [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe fuzzer detects and reports the crash[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Partial Fix**: The changes to JOIN and PART were in the right direction but [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mincomplete, like fixing the symptom [0m[1;39m([0m[39mproto_tree length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m while missing the disease [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mbuffer overflow in memcpy[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis comprehensive fix addresses all three issues by:[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Fixing the actual `tvb_memcpy` calls in all three vulnerable functions[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Ensuring `copy_length` is used everywhere it's needed[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Applying the proven-correct pattern from `dissect_irc_list` to all affected [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunctions[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m[1;35mdissect_irc_join[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, proto_item *item, int offset[0m[1;39m)[0m                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    start_offset = offset;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    channel_name = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name == NULL [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    tree = [0m[1;35mproto_item_add_subtree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mitem, ett_irc_request_command_join[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Parse the channels to join*[0m[35m/[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;35mwhile[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_offset_exists[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        end_offset = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m','[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m end_offset == [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_join_channel, tvb, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            return;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        copy_length = end_offset - start_offset;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcopy_length < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcopy_length : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_join_channel, tvb, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, copy_length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        start_offset = end_offset + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    return;[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+static void[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m[1;35mdissect_irc_part[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, proto_item *item, int offset[0m[1;39m)[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    proto_tree *tree;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    int start_offset;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    int end_offset;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
