[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    int copy_length;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    uint8_t *channel_name;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_get_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[32m'#'[0m[1;39m)[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    channel_name = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name == NULL [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        return;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    start_offset = offset;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    tree = [0m[1;35mproto_item_add_subtree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mitem, ett_irc_request_command_part[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;35mwhile[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mtvb_offset_exists[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        end_offset = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m','[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m end_offset == [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            int start_message = [0m[1;35mtvb_find_uint8[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset, length, [0m[32m':'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m start_message == [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m [0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_part_channel, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtvb, start_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m? length : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                [0m[1;35mproto_item_append_text[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, [0m[32m"Channel: %s"[0m[39m, channel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                return;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            length = start_message-start_offset;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_part_channel, tvb, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset, length, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlength < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            start_message++;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            length = [0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_message[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+            [0m[1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_part_message, tvb, [0m   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m5792732f783158c66fb4f3756458ca24e46e827d[0m[1;39m)[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mDEDUP_TOKEN: __interceptor_malloc--dissect_irc_names--dissect_irc_request_command[0m   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNAMES [0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa,#hello\[0m[1;36m012[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/user/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mwireshark[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpjtrn_6xz[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandler_irc -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue reports a heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability in the IRC protocol [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdissector of Wireshark, specifically in the `dissect_irc_names` function. When [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprocessing a specially crafted IRC NAMES command, the code attempts to write [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbytes to a [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte allocated buffer, triggering an AddressSanitizer error. The [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpatch attempt modifies the `dissect_irc_join` and `dissect_irc_part` functions by [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreplacing manual memory management [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmalloc/free[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m with Wireshark's memory management[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and adds proper bounds checking. However, after applying the patch, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe identical heap-buffer-overflow persists in the same location [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`dissect_irc_names`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, indicating that the patch did not address the actual [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvulnerability.[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue Analysis[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue shows a heap-buffer-overflow occurring during fuzzing of the IRC [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandler with the following characteristics:[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Crash Location:**[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Function: `dissect_irc_names` at [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[35m/src/wireshark/epan/dissectors/[0m[95mpacket-irc.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;36m563[0m[39m`[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Operation: `tvb_memcpy` attempting to write [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Target: A [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte buffer allocated at line [0m[1;36m537[0m[39m of the same file[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Call Stack:**[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe vulnerability is triggered through the following path:[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. `dissect_irc` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m1114[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. `dissect_irc_request` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m811[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. `dissect_irc_request_command` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m702[0m[1;39m)[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. `dissect_irc_names` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m563[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Input Triggering the Crash:**[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fuzzer input consists of: `NAMES [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa,#hello\n`[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis input contains a NAMES command with a very long channel name [0m[1;39m([0m[39mapproximately [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m125[0m[39m [0m[32m'a'[0m[39m characters[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m followed by a comma and another channel name.[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Memory Corruption Details:**[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m bytes were allocated[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes were attempted to be written[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow occurs immediately after the allocated region [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0[0m[39m bytes after the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m51[0m[39m-byte region[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- AddressSanitizer severity score: [0m[1;36m45[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmulti-byte-write-heap-buffer-overflow[0m[1;39m)[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt Description[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch modifies two functions in `epan/dissectors/packet-irc.c`:[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Changes to `dissect_irc_join` function:**[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Replaced `[0m[1;35mmalloc[0m[1;39m([0m[39mCHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` with `[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mCHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Removed the `[0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` calls at exit points[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Added a new variable `copy_length` to explicitly calculate the length to copy[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Changed the length calculation in the loop from using `length` directly to using[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`copy_length = end_offset - start_offset`[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Updated `tvb_memcpy` and `proto_tree_add_item` calls to use `copy_length` [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minstead of `length` in the loop[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Changes to `dissect_irc_part` function:**[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Applied identical changes as `dissect_irc_join`: replacing malloc with [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwmem_alloc[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Removed all `[0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` calls[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Added `copy_length` variable for explicit length calculation[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Updated length calculations in the loop to use `copy_length = end_offset - [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset`[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Modified function calls to use the corrected length parameter[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Additional Changes:**[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Added include directive: `#include <wsutil/wmem/wmem.h>`[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Minor whitespace/formatting adjustments[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Post-Patch Analysis[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying the patch, the identical heap-buffer-overflow persists with the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexact same characteristics:[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Unchanged Crash Details:**[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same crash location: `dissect_irc_names` at line [0m[1;36m563[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same memory allocation location: line [0m[1;36m537[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnow [0m[1;36m541[0m[39m after patch offset[0m[1;39m)[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same buffer sizes: [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m bytes allocated, [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes written[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Same input triggers the crash[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Identical call stack through the dissector functions[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Critical Observation:**[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch modified `dissect_irc_join` and `dissect_irc_part` functions, but the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mactual crash occurs in the `dissect_irc_names` function, which was not modified by [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe patch. This explains why the vulnerability persists unchanged.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas Requiring Investigation[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo fully understand and address this vulnerability, the following areas of the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcodebase should be investigated:[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **The `dissect_irc_names` function [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m520[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m580[0m[39m approximately[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:** This is [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhere the actual overflow occurs. The function needs examination to understand:[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How it allocates the [0m[1;36m51[0m[39m-byte buffer[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How it calculates the length to copy [0m[1;39m([0m[39mresulting in [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - What the CHANNELLEN constant is defined as[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How it parses comma-separated channel names[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Buffer size calculations:** Understanding the relationship between:[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - CHANNELLEN constant definition[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The actual channel name lengths in the input[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How the code determines copy lengths when parsing comma-separated values[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Similar patterns in related functions:** Since `dissect_irc_join` and [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`dissect_irc_part` contain similar parsing logic for comma-separated channel names,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minvestigating whether they have similar vulnerabilities [0m[1;39m([0m[39meven if not currently [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtriggered[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m would be valuable.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Input validation:** How the IRC dissector validates or limits the length of:[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Individual channel names[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The total command length[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Parameters before passing them to parsing functions[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **The tvb_memcpy usage patterns:** Examining all uses of `tvb_memcpy` in the IRC[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdissector to identify if there are other locations with similar buffer overflow [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrisks.[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1549[0m[39m:    subids += pprid_subids_len;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1550[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mepan/dissectors/packet-rk512.[0m[1;92mc:182[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m192[0m                                              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Analysis[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Root Cause Identification[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe evaluation report confirms that the previous patch incorrectly modified [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`dissect_irc_join` and `dissect_irc_part` functions, but the actual crash occurs in[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe `dissect_irc_names` function at line [0m[1;36m563[0m[39m. The core issue is a **critical buffer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow vulnerability** caused by using the wrong length parameter in [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tvb_memcpy`.[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Critical Bug at line [0m[1;36m563[0m[39m of `dissect_irc_names`:**[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere, `length` comes from `[0m[1;35mtvb_captured_length_remaining[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, start_offset[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m548[0m[39m, which returns the **total remaining bytes in the buffer** [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m132[0m[39m bytes in [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe crash case[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. However, the allocated buffer `channel_name` is only [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m51[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, resulting in a heap-buffer-overflow.[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe correct length should be the distance from `start_offset` to the comma [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdelimiter [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`end_offset - start_offset`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, bounded by `CHANNELLEN`.[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Pattern Analysis[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mExamining all four functions that parse comma-separated channel names:[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **`dissect_irc_names` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mCRASH LOCATION[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m** - Line [0m[1;36m563[0m[39m: Uses `length` without [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbounds checking[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **`dissect_irc_join`** - Line [0m[1;36m370[0m[39m: Uses `length` instead of segment length [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`end_offset - start_offset`[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **`dissect_irc_part`** - Line [0m[1;36m438[0m[39m: Uses `length` instead of segment length [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`end_offset - start_offset`[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **`dissect_irc_list`** - Line [0m[1;36m613[0m[39m: **CORRECT** - Uses `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mend_offset-start_offset [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m< CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? end_offset-start_offset : CHANNELLEN`[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe `dissect_irc_list` function demonstrates the correct implementation pattern.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why Previous Patch Failed[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe previous patch attempted to fix `dissect_irc_join` and `dissect_irc_part` by:[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Replacing `malloc` with `wmem_alloc` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mgood approach[0m[1;39m)[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Adding a `copy_length` variable [0m[1;39m([0m[39mgood approach[0m[1;39m)[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **BUT** it still calculated `copy_length = end_offset - start_offset` and then [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcompared it with `CHANNELLEN`[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHowever, it **did not patch `dissect_irc_names`**, which is where the actual crash [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moccurs. The identical crash in the additional issue log confirms this.[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Comprehensive Fix Strategy[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Add Required Header[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInsert after line [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m in `epan/dissectors/packet-irc.c`:[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m#include <wsutil/wmem/wmem.h>[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis provides access to Wireshark's memory management API.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Fix `dissect_irc_names` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mPrimary Crash Location[0m[1;39m)[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Line [0m[1;36m537[0m[39m:** Replace malloc with wmem_alloc:[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchannel_name = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Line [0m[1;36m563[0m[39m:** Fix the critical buffer overflow by calculating the correct segment [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength:[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mint copy_length = end_offset - start_offset;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcopy_length > CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    copy_length = CHANNELLEN;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, copy_length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mOr more concisely:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend_offset-start_offset < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m? end_offset-start_offset : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Lines [0m[1;36m558[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m570[0m[39m:** Remove all `[0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` calls [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwmem handles cleanup [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mautomatically[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Fix `dissect_irc_join` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mLatent Vulnerability[0m[1;39m)[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Line [0m[1;36m344[0m[39m:** Replace malloc:[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchannel_name = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Line [0m[1;36m370[0m[39m:** Fix length calculation in the loop body:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mint copy_length = end_offset - start_offset;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcopy_length > CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    copy_length = CHANNELLEN;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, copy_length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Line [0m[1;36m373[0m[39m:** Fix proto_tree_add_item length parameter:[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_join_channel, tvb, start_offset, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mend_offset-start_offset, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Lines [0m[1;36m365[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m377[0m[39m:** Remove `[0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` calls.[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Fix `dissect_irc_part` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mLatent Vulnerability[0m[1;39m)[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Line [0m[1;36m393[0m[39m:** Replace malloc:[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchannel_name = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, CHANNELLEN+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Line [0m[1;36m438[0m[39m:** Fix length calculation in the loop body:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mint copy_length = end_offset - start_offset;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcopy_length > CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    copy_length = CHANNELLEN;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m}[0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, copy_length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Line [0m[1;36m441[0m[39m:** Fix proto_tree_add_item length parameter:[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mproto_tree_add_item[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtree, hf_irc_request_command_part_channel, tvb, start_offset, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mend_offset-start_offset, ENC_ASCII[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Lines [0m[1;36m417[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m433[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m445[0m[39m:** Remove `[0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchannel_name[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` calls.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m. No Changes Needed for `dissect_irc_list`[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe `dissect_irc_list` function already implements the correct pattern and should [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mremain unchanged.[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Why This Is Optimal[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Addresses Root Cause:** Directly fixes the actual crash location in [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`dissect_irc_names` that was missed by the previous patch.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Prevents Related Vulnerabilities:** Fixes the same pattern in [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`dissect_irc_join` and `dissect_irc_part` that could be triggered with similar [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmalicious inputs.[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Follows Wireshark Best Practices:**[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Uses `[0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` for automatic memory management[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Eliminates manual `[0m[1;35mfree[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` calls that can cause memory leaks or double-free [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39missues[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Matches the pattern used in other Wireshark dissectors[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Preserves Existing Logic:**[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Maintains all protocol tree additions[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Keeps the same parsing flow and channel name handling[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Only modifies memory allocation and length calculations[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `memset` calls for null-termination remain in place[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Minimal Impact:** Changes are surgical and localized to the vulnerable memory [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moperations without affecting the dissector's overall structure or functionality.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### How It Preserves Existing Codebase[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **No functional changes** to parsing logic, command dispatch, or protocol tree [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstructure[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **No changes** to fuzzing harness or test code[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **No removal** of functionality - all channel names are still parsed and [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdisplayed[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Compatible** with existing tests as the protocol tree output remains identical[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- **Safe memory management** using Wireshark's established patterns prevents future[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39missues[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Addressing Evaluation Report Issues[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Fixes the heap-buffer-overflow at line [0m[1;36m563[0m[39m:** By using `end_offset - [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart_offset` bounded by `CHANNELLEN` instead of unbounded `length`[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Handles the [0m[1;36m132[0m[39m-byte input:** The long channel name [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m125[0m[39m [0m[32m'a'[0m[39ms + [0m[32m'#'[0m[39m + [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32m',#hello'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m will now be truncated to [0m[1;36m50[0m[39m bytes for display while still being fully [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprocessed in the protocol tree[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **Prevents recurrence:** Similar patterns in `dissect_irc_join` and [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`dissect_irc_part` are also fixed[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Memory management:** Switching to wmem eliminates potential memory leaks and [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfollows Wireshark conventions[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Potential Side Effects and Mitigation[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Side Effect [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m:** Channel names longer than [0m[1;36m50[0m[39m characters will be truncated in the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdisplay text appended via `proto_item_append_text`.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Mitigation:** This is expected behavior - the IRC protocol defines `CHANNELLEN` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mas [0m[1;36m50[0m[39m, so this is protocol-compliant truncation. The full channel name is still [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvisible in the protocol tree via `proto_tree_add_item` which uses the actual [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msegment length.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Side Effect [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m:** Memory allocation failures could cause silent returns.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**Mitigation:** The existing NULL checks [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m539[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m346[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m395[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m588[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m handle this [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mgracefully. Additionally, `wmem_alloc` with `[0m[1;35mwmem_packet_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` is more robust [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthan malloc as it's part of Wireshark's memory pool management.[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Reference Implementation[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fix follows the exact pattern already correctly implemented in [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`dissect_irc_list` at line [0m[1;36m613[0m[39m:[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```c[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mtvb_memcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvb, channel_name, start_offset, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mend_offset-start_offset < CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m? end_offset-start_offset : CHANNELLEN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis proven pattern is replicated to the vulnerable functions.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
